recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: SAVE THIS Tastiest Pot Roast Recipe EVER üòç (recipe üëáüèΩ) For more tasty high protein recipes just like this comment ‚Äúcookbook‚Äù and I‚Äôll send you the purchase link to my digital cookbooks! üòâ  Macros per serving (x6 servings): approx 445 calories |59g P | 22g C | 14g F Ingredients 	‚Ä¢3.5 lb chuck roast ü•©, cut into chunks 	‚Ä¢Salt üßÇ, pepper üå∂Ô∏è, and garlic powder üßÑ 	‚Ä¢1 tbsp avocado oil ü•ë 	‚Ä¢2 large onions üßÖ, chopped 	‚Ä¢5-7 garlic cloves üßÑ, whole 	‚Ä¢1 tbsp tomato paste üçÖ 	‚Ä¢1 tbsp beef-flavored Better Than Bouillon ü•£ (or substitute with 4 cups beef broth ü•£) 	‚Ä¢4 cups water üíß (omit if using broth) 	‚Ä¢1 sprig rosemary üåø 	‚Ä¢1 sprig thyme üåø 	‚Ä¢1 lb baby potatoes ü•î 	‚Ä¢1 lb baby carrots ü•ï 	‚Ä¢3 bay leaves üçÉ For Thickening 	‚Ä¢1 tbsp cornstarch üåΩ 	‚Ä¢1/2 cup cold water üíß Instructions 1.Season the Roast: Season the chuck roast chunks with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. 2.Sear the Meat: In a Dutch oven, heat 1 tbsp of avocado oil over high heat. Sear the roast on all sides until well-browned, then remove and set aside. 3.Cook the Veggies: Reduce the heat to medium. Add chopped onions and whole garlic cloves to the pot. Cook for about 5 minutes, until they begin to soften. 4.Add Tomato Paste & Bouillon: Stir in the tomato paste and beef Better Than Bouillon. Cook for another 3-5 minutes, allowing the flavors to blend. 5.Add Broth or Water: Pour in 4 cups of water (or broth if using). 6.Add Herbs & Veggies: Place the rosemary, thyme, baby potatoes, and baby carrots in the pot. Add the seared roast and bay leaves. 7.Bake: Cover and bake in a 350¬∞F oven for approximately 3-4 hours, until the roast is fork-tender. 8.Make the Gravy: Remove everything from the pot. In a small bowl, mix 1 tbsp cornstarch with 1/2 cup cold water. Stir this mixture into the pot liquid over medium heat until it thickens. 	 9.Serve: Serve the pot roast hot with the thickened gravy, mashed potatoes or rice and enjoy! . . . . #icekarim #healthyrecipes #easyrecipes #mealprep #quickrecipes

steps: Season the chuck roast chunks with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
In a Dutch oven, heat 1 tbsp of avocado oil over high heat. Sear the roast on all sides until well-browned, then remove and set aside.
Reduce the heat to medium. Add chopped onions and whole garlic cloves to the pot. Cook for about 5 minutes, until they begin to soften.
Stir in the tomato paste and beef Better Than Bouillon. Cook for another 3-5 minutes, allowing the flavors to blend.
Pour in 4 cups of water (or broth if using).
Place the rosemary, thyme, baby potatoes, and baby carrots in the pot. Add the seared roast and bay leaves.
Cover and bake in a 350 F oven for approximately 3-4 hours, until the roast is fork-tender.
Remove everything from the pot. In a small bowl, mix 1 tbsp of cornstarch with 1/2 cup of cold water. Stir this mixture into the pot liquid over medium heat until it thickens.
Serve the pot roast hot with the thickened gravy, mashed potatoes or rice, and enjoy.
extracted.title: SAVE THIS Tastiest Pot Roast Recipe EVER

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Broccoli Cheddar Soup ü•¶üßÄ Here‚Äôs how to make this copycat Panera recipe: Ingredients 1 lb bacon, chopped (reserve some for topping) 2 tbsp butter 2 tbsp bacon fat 1 medium yellow onion, diced Salt and pepper, to taste 1 tsp smoked paprika Dash of cayenne, optional 6-8 cloves garlic, minced (to taste) 1/4 cup flour 2-3 cups chicken broth (start with 2, add more if needed) 2 heads of broccoli, chopped and rinsed 1 cup shredded carrots 1 tsp chicken bouillon (to taste) 2 cups heavy cream or half & half 2 cups freshly shredded sharp cheddar (plus extra for topping) Dash of nutmeg, optional Instructions 1. In a large Dutch oven, cook your bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove and set aside, leaving about 2 tbsp of bacon fat in the pot.‚Ä® 2. Add your butter to the pot. Stir in your onions, salt, pepper, paprika, and cayenne. Cook until the onions start to soften, about 5 minutes.‚Ä® 3. Add in your garlic, stirring for 30 seconds until fragrant.‚Ä® 4. Sprinkle in the flour and stir well. Cook for about 2 minutes.‚Ä® 5. Slowly pour in half of your chicken broth, stirring to combine, then add the rest. If the base seems too thick, add in the third cup of broth.‚Ä® 6. Add in your broccoli, carrots, and chicken bouillon. Stir and bring the soup to a simmer. Cover, reduce heat, and let it simmer for about 10-15 minutes, or until the veggies are tender.‚Ä® 7. Turn off the heat and pour in your cream, stirring well.‚Ä® 8. Add in your cheese, stirring until melted.‚Ä® 9. Top each bowl with extra cheese and reserved bacon. Enjoy!‚Ä®‚Ä®#broccolicheddarsoup #soup #souptok #soupseason #soupszn #broccoli #cheddar #souprecipe #fallsoup #fallrecipes #easyrecipes #dinner #easydinner #dinnerideas #onepot #onepotmeals #foodtok #broccolicheddar

steps: In a large Dutch oven, cook bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove and set aside, leaving about 2 tbsp of bacon fat in the pot.
Add butter to the pot. Stir in onions, salt, pepper, paprika, and cayenne. Cook until onions start to soften, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic, stirring for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Sprinkle in flour and stir well. Cook for about 2 minutes.
Slowly pour in half of the chicken broth, stirring to combine, then add the rest. If the base seems too thick, add in the third cup of broth.
Add broccoli, carrots, and chicken bouillon. Stir and bring to a simmer. Cover, reduce heat, and let simmer for about 10-15 minutes, or until veggies are tender.
Turn off heat and pour in cream, stirring well.
Add cheese, stirring until melted, and top each bowl with extra cheese and reserved bacon.
extracted.title: Broccoli Cheddar Soup

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: BROWN BUTTER CREAM CHEESE SNICKERDOODLE COBBLER Snickerdoodle + brown butter + cream cheese??? I can‚Äôt think of a better combo ‚ú® Couldn‚Äôt be easier and just pure heaven in every bite! Recipe below OR go to my website through the link in my bio ü§é  #Recipe Details: Ingredients: - 1/3 cup salted butter - 3/4 cup milk of choice - 2 tsp vanilla extract -  1 1/2 cups granulated sugar - 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour @Bob‚Äôs Red Mill  - 2 1/4 tsp baking powder - 3/4 tsp salt - 2 tsp cinnamon - 1 1/2 cups brown sugar, light or dark - 1 1/2 cups hot water - 6 oz cream cheese, cut into chunks @Philly Cream Cheese  Topping: - 1/4 cup granulated sugar - 1/2 tsp cinnamon - Vanilla ice cream, for serving @Tillamook  Instructions: Preheat the oven to 350F. Start by browning the butter. Add the butter to a saucepan over medium-high heat. Allow to melt and slightly brown, while stirring continuously (~5-8 minutes). Remove from heat and pour the brown butter into a 9x13‚Äù baking pan. Set aside. Make the cobbler. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon. Set aside. In a separate large bowl, whisk together the milk, vanilla, and sugar.  Add the dry ingredients to the wet, and use a wooden spoon or spatula to ix until just combined. Spoon or scoop the batter over the brown butter in the baking pan, being careful not to mix.  Place the cubes of cream cheese all over the surface of the batter. Sprinkle the brown sugar all over the batter and cream cheese. Then, gently pour hot water over the batter and brown sugar.  Carefully place the baking pan into the oven, and bake at 350F for 30-35 minutes, until golden brown and mostly set (the bottom will still be gooey). While baking, mix the sugar and cinnamon together for the topping. Remove the cobbler from the oven, and immediately sprinkle the cinnamon sugar mixture over the top. Let cool slightly before serving. Serve warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream. Enjoy! #brownbutter #creamcheese #snickerdoodle #cobbler #vanillaicecream #fall #fallbaking #falldessert #cozy #cozyrecipe #Dessert #baking #cinnamon @From Our Place @Earlywood

steps: Preheat the oven to 350F.

In a saucepan over medium-high heat, melt the butter and allow it to brown while stirring continuously for about 5-8 minutes. Remove from heat and pour the brown butter into a 9x13 baking pan. Set aside.
In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt, and 2 tsp cinnamon. Set aside.
In a separate large bowl, whisk together the milk, vanilla, and 1 1/2 cups granulated sugar.
Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix until just combined using a wooden spoon or spatula.
Spoon the batter over the brown butter in the baking pan without mixing them together.
Place the cubes of cream cheese evenly over the surface of the batter.
Sprinkle 1 1/2 cups brown sugar all over the batter and cream cheese.
Gently pour 1 1/2 cups hot water over the batter and brown sugar.
Bake at 350F for 30-35 minutes, until golden brown and mostly set, but the bottom should still be gooey.
While baking, mix the 1/4 cup granulated sugar and 1/2 tsp cinnamon together for the topping.
Remove the cobbler from the oven and immediately sprinkle the cinnamon sugar mixture over the top.
Let cool slightly before serving and serve warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
extracted.title: Brown Butter Cream Cheese Snickerdoodle Cobbler

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Replying to @ùì™ùìµùîÇùìºùì∏ùì∑ ü¶á here is a full step-by-step walk through of my viral broccoli cheddar soup recipeüíõenjoy! Ingredients: - 1 medium white onion, diced - 5-6 cloves garlic, minced - 1-2 tbsp olive oil - 3 tbsp butter - salt, pepper, onion & garlic powder - 1/4 cup flour - 4 cups chicken broth (can sub for vegetable) - 1/2 cup 2% milk - 1/2 cup half & half - 2 cups freahly grated cheddar cheese - broccoli - shredded carrots *optional* - bacon - toasted & buttered french bread #broccolicheddarsoup #onepotmeals #dinnerideas #soupseason #souprecipe #onepot #onepotrecipe #easydinnerideas #weeknightdinner #fallrecipes #mealinspo #mealideas #broccolicheddar #cookwithme #soup #cozyrecipes

steps: Heat olive oil and butter in a large pot over medium heat.
Add diced onion and saut√© until translucent, about 5 minutes.
Stir in minced garlic and cook for an additional minute until fragrant.
Season with salt, pepper, onion powder, and garlic powder.
Sprinkle flour over the mixture and stir to combine, cooking for another 2 minutes.
Slowly add the chicken broth while stirring to avoid lumps.
Bring to a simmer, then add broccoli and cook until tender, about 10-15 minutes.
Stir in the milk and half & half, adjust seasoning if necessary.
Remove from heat and gradually add grated cheddar cheese, stirring until melted and smooth.
Optionally garnish with shredded carrots and crispy bacon.
Serve with toasted, buttered French bread.

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: MINI APPLE CRUMBLE CHEESECAKE  Everything about this ü§å Recipe below OR go to my website through the link in my bio ü§é #Recipe Details: Crust: - 1 1/2 cups graham cracker crumbs @Honey Maid  - 5 tbsp salted butter, melted - 1/2 tbsp granulated sugar  - 1/2 tsp cinnamon  Apple Pie Filling: - 3 apples of choice (I used Granny Smith), peeled & sliced - 1/3 cup brown sugar, light or dark - 1/2 tsp cinnamon - Optional: 1/2 tsp apple pie spice @McCormick Spices  - 2 tbsp water - 1 tbsp lemon juice - 1/4 cup (1/2 stick) salted butter - 2 tsp cornstarch mixed with 1 tbsp water Cheesecake: - 16oz cream cheese, at room temperature @Philly Cream Cheese  - 1/2 cup granulated sugar - 1/4 tsp salt - 2 eggs, at room temperature - 1/4 cup heavy cream, at room temperature - 1 tsp vanilla extract Crumble: - 3 tbsp salted butter, melted - 1/4 cup + 2 tbsp all-purpose flour @Bob‚Äôs Red Mill  - 1/4 cup rolled oats - 1/2 tsp cinnamon - 3 tbsp brown sugar  Salted Caramel (Optional): - 3 tbsp coconut oil, melted - 1/4 cup smooth almond butter @Jem  - 1/4 cup + 3 tbsp maple syrup - Pinch of salt Instructions: Preheat the oven to 350F. Butter a 6‚Äù round cheesecake or springform pan, then line the bottom with a parchment paper circle. Set aside. Prepare the crust. In a medium bowl, mix together the graham cracker crumbs, melted butter, sugar, and cinnamon, until all of the crumbs are coated with butter. Pour the crumbs into the prepared pan, pressing evenly and firmly all around the pan. Bake at 350F for 8-10 minutes, until lightly golden. Remove and let cool to room temperature. Prepare the apple pie filling. In a saucepan over medium heat, add the butter, brown sugar, spices, water, and lemon juice. Mix until the butter is melted. Add the apples and mix. Cover and cook for ~10 minutes, until the apples are softened.  Then, add the cornstarch/water mixture, and mix until well combined and the apple mixture is thickened. Set aside and cool. Prepare the crumble. In a medium bowl, mix together the flour, oats, cinnamon, brown sugar, and melted butter until well combined and the mixture is crumbly. Set aside. Make the cheesecake filling. In a large bowl, beat the cream cheese until soft. Then, beat in the sugar and salt. Mixing on low, add the eggs, one at a time. Then, beat in the heavy cream and vanilla.  Assemble the cheesecake. Wrap the bottom of the cheesecake pan with 2 layers of foil. Pour 1/2 of the cheesecake mixture onto the crust, and gently top it with the apple pie filling.  Top the apple filling with the other half of the cheesecake mixture. Then top with the crumble. Place the pan in the center of a 9x13‚Äù pan, and pour boiling water in until it reaches halfway up the cheesecake pan.  Bake at 350F for 60-70 minutes, until the edges are set but the middle is a bit jiggly. Once done, open the oven door halfway and let it cool to room temperature for 1-2 hours.  After cooled, wrap the cheesecake tightly, and place into the fridge for at least 4 hours or overnight to chill. Once ready to serve, make the salted caramel by mixing together all of the ingredients in a medium bowl.  Release the cheesecake from the pan, and drizzle with the salted caramel. Slice and serve.  Enjoy! #mini #apple #crumble #cheesecake #applecrumble #applecrisp #applepie #applecrumblecheesecake #minicheesecake #cheesecakerecipe #apples #fall #fallbaking #fallrecipe #falldessert #fallcheesecake #fallcake #saltedcaramel #warmapples #applepiefilling #cinnamon #applepiespice @From Our Place @Earlywood @Fat Daddio's

steps: Preheat the oven to 350F.
Butter a 6-inch round cheesecake or springform pan, then line the bottom with a parchment paper circle. Set aside.
In a medium bowl, mix together graham cracker crumbs, melted butter, sugar, and cinnamon until all crumbs are coated with butter.
Pour the crumbs into the prepared pan, pressing evenly and firmly all around the pan.
Bake at 350F for 8-10 minutes, until lightly golden. Remove and let cool to room temperature.
In a saucepan over medium heat, add the butter, brown sugar, spices, water, and lemon juice. Mix until the butter is melted.
Add the apples and mix. Cover and cook for about 10 minutes until apples are softened.
Add the cornstarch/water mixture and mix until well combined and the apple mixture is thickened. Set aside to cool.
In a medium bowl, mix together flour, oats, cinnamon, brown sugar, and melted butter until well combined and crumbly. Set aside.
In a large bowl, beat the cream cheese until soft. Beat in sugar and salt.
Mix on low, add eggs one at a time. Beat in heavy cream and vanilla.
Wrap the bottom of the cheesecake pan with 2 layers of foil to prevent leaks.
Pour half of the cheesecake mixture onto the crust, then gently top with the apple pie filling.
Top the apple filling with the remaining cheesecake mixture, then with the crumble.
Place the pan in the center of a 9x13 pan and pour boiling water in until halfway up the cheesecake pan.
Bake at 350F for 60-70 minutes until the edges set but the middle is slightly jiggly.
Once done, open the oven door halfway and let it cool to room temperature for 1-2 hours.
After cooled, wrap the cheesecake tightly and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight to chill.
For salted caramel, mix coconut oil, almond butter, maple syrup, and a pinch of salt in a bowl.
Release the cheesecake from the pan and drizzle with salted caramel before slicing and serving.
extracted.title: Mini Apple Crumble Cheesecake

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Lasagna Soup ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî• She‚Äôs finally here and she‚Äôs just as delicious as I remember. Here‚Äôs how to make it: 1 yellow onion, diced  6-8 cloves minced garlic, to taste 1/2 lb italian sausage  1/2 lb lean ground beef (note: can use a full lb of preferred protein) 2-3 T tomato paste Salt and pepper to taste 1-2 t @Tony Chachere Seasoning, to taste (optional) 1 t dried basil 1 t dried parsley 1 t dried oregano 1 t Italian seasoning 1 t red pepper, to taste 24 oz @CarboneFineFood marinara 1/2 cup heavy cream 6 cups beef broth 1/2 lb lasagna noodles, broken Handful of freshly torn basil 1 cup parm 1 cup ricotta 1 cup mozzarella 1/4 cup fresh parsley Salt and pepper to taste 1. In a pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add in your onion, salt, pepper, dried basil, dried parsley, dried oregano, italian seasoning, and red pepper. Saute until softened, about 5 minutes. 2. Throw in your garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds. 3. Add in your sausage and beef, breaking into pieces with a wooden spoon. Season with salt, pepper, and Tony‚Äôs (if using). Cook until no longer pink. ( you might need to drain the grease) 4. Clear a center in the pot and add the tomato paste. Let sit undisturbed for a minute or two before incorporating with the rest. Then cook for another 2 minutes. 5. Pour in your beef broth and marinara. Bring to a gentle boil. 6. Pour in your lasagna pieces, reduce heat, and simmer for about 10 minutes, or until al dente, stirring occasionally. 7. While your noodles are cooking, in a medium mixing bowl, combine the ricotta, parmesan, mozzarella, parsley, salt, and pepper. Stir until incorporated. 6. Once your noodles are done, turn the heat off, add in your heavy cream and fresh basil. Add in a few dollops of the ricotta mixture, saving some for topping. Stir to combvine and taste for seasonings.  7. Serve with a dollop of the ricotta mixture and fresh basil or parsley. Enjoy! #lasagnasoup #soup #souptok #souprecipe #easydinner #dinnerideas #onepotmeals #fallrecipe #easyrecipes #easyrecipe #foodtok #cooking #lasagna

steps: In a pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add diced onion, salt, pepper, dried basil, dried parsley, dried oregano, Italian seasoning, and red pepper. Saut√© until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add sausage and ground beef, breaking into pieces with a wooden spoon. Season with salt, pepper, and Tony's seasoning (if using). Cook until no longer pink, draining grease if necessary.
Clear a center in the pot and add tomato paste, letting it sit undisturbed for a minute or two before incorporating. Cook for another 2 minutes.
Pour in the beef broth and marinara sauce. Bring to a gentle boil.
Add broken lasagna pieces, reduce heat, and simmer for about 10 minutes, or until al dente, stirring occasionally.
In a medium mixing bowl, combine ricotta, parmesan, mozzarella, fresh parsley, salt, and pepper. Stir until incorporated.
Once noodles are done, turn the heat off. Add heavy cream and fresh basil. Stir in a few dollops of the ricotta mixture, saving some for topping. Taste for seasonings and adjust as needed.
Serve with a dollop of the ricotta mixture and garnish with fresh basil or parsley.
extracted.title: Lasagna Soup

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Fudgy Cheesecake Brownie Recipe Ingredients Cream Cheese Layer - 225g / 8 oz cream cheese, softened - 1 large egg, room temperature - 60g / 1/4 cup granulated sugar - 5mL / 1 tsp vanilla extract Brownie Layer - 225g / 1 cup unsalted butter - 125g / 1/2 cup Dutch-processed cocoa powder - 5mL / 1 tsp vanilla extract - 115g / 1/2 cup light brown sugar - 450g / 1 3/4 cups powdered sugar - 180g / 3/4 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips - 85g / 1/3 cup semi-sweet chocolate, chopped - 3 large eggs, room temperature - 65g / 1/2 cup all-purpose flour - Pinch of salt - 15mL / 3 tbsp olive oil Method Preheat oven to 175¬∞C / 350¬∞F, Grease and line an 8x8 inch pan with parchment paper. Prepare cream cheese layer:  Whisk cream cheese, egg, vanilla, and sugar until smooth. Prepare brownie layer: Brown butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat, stirring every 10 seconds. Once milk solids from butter sink and turn golden brown, transfer to heatproof bowl.Add cocoa powder, oil, vanilla, and chopped chocolate; mix until dissolved. Let the mixture cool at room temperature for 15-20 mins  Whisk eggs and light brown sugar ( for 4-6 min ) until dissolved and mixture turns into light pale in color. Add powdered sugar; mix until combined. (1-2 min ) Combine with browned butter mixture,mix until combined. Add flour, and chocolate chips. Mix until just combined don‚Äôt over the batter. Transfer half of brownie mixture to prepared pan. Reserve 30g / 2-3 tbsp cream cheese mixture; add remaining on brownie mixture. Top with remaining brownie batter; add reserved cream cheese mixture. Make swirls. Bake for 40-45 minutes or until the edges are golden and center is a little fudgy. Let cool completely before cutting. Tips: Dissolve sugar in eggs for crackly top. Avoid overmixing. Adjust baking time. #cheesecake #brownies #cheesecakebrownies #fudgybrownies #bakingrecipe #recipe

extracted.notes: Dissolve sugar in eggs for a crackly top. Adjust baking time as needed.
steps: Preheat oven to 175¬∞C / 350¬∞F.
Grease and line an 8x8 inch pan with parchment paper.
Prepare cream cheese layer: Whisk cream cheese, egg, vanilla extract, and granulated sugar until smooth.
Prepare brownie layer: Brown unsalted butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat, stirring every 10 seconds until milk solids sink and turn golden brown.
Transfer browned butter to a heatproof bowl. Add cocoa powder, olive oil, vanilla extract, and chopped semi-sweet chocolate; mix until dissolved.
Let the mixture cool at room temperature for 15-20 minutes.
Whisk eggs and light brown sugar for 4-6 minutes until dissolved and light pale in color.
Add powdered sugar to the egg mixture; mix until combined (1-2 minutes).
Combine with the browned butter mixture, mixing until well combined.
Add flour and chocolate chips, mixing until just combined; avoid overmixing.
Transfer half of the brownie mixture to the prepared pan. Set aside 30g / 2-3 tbsp of cream cheese mixture and add the remaining to the brownie mixture.
Top with the remaining brownie batter and add the reserved cream cheese mixture. Create swirls using a knife.
Bake for 40-45 minutes or until the edges are golden and the center is a little fudgy.
Let cool completely before cutting.
extracted.title: Fudgy Cheesecake Brownie Recipe

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Easy, Healthier Cinnamon Roll French Toast in 15 minutes. It‚Äôs fluffy, delicious, lower in calories and PACKED with protein! - 1. Add the following Ingredients to a bowl and mix well: ‚Ä¢ 1 egg ‚Ä¢ 1/3 cup any milk (I used 1% for low calorie) ‚Ä¢ 1/2 scoop vanilla protein powder ( @myproteinus code: RAZI) ‚Ä¢ 1 tbsp any sweetener (I use stevia or splenda brown sugar)  ‚Ä¢ optional: 1/4 tsp vanilla extract and cinnamon - 2. Soak 2-3 slices of your bread of choice into the mixture. 2 slices work just fine if you want to keep the carbs lower. Then cook each piece of bread with 1 tsp of butter for about 1-2 minutes on each side until they‚Äôre crispy - 3. Combine the following ingredients for your filling: ‚Ä¢ 1/3 cup fat free greek yogurt, plain ‚Ä¢ 1/2 scoop vanilla protein powder ‚Ä¢ optional: splash of milk if you want a thinner consistency - 4. Layer each piece of toast with the filling and cinnamon. - - Calories/Macros (with 2 toast): 387 calories, 38g carbs, 40g protein, 10g fat - Calories/Macros (with 3 toast): 447 calories, 51g carbs, 42g protein, 11g fat - Numbers may slightly vary depending on the brands and ingredients you use! - - #recipe #food #cooking #homecooking #healthy #dessert #healthyrecipes #frenchtoast #cinnamonroll #breakfast #breakfastideas #protein #healthylifestyle #fitnessjourney

steps: In a bowl, mix together the egg, milk, vanilla protein powder, sweetener, vanilla extract (optional), and cinnamon.
Soak 2-3 slices of your chosen bread in the mixture.
In a skillet, melt 1 tsp of butter over medium heat and cook each piece of soaked bread for about 1-2 minutes on each side until crispy.
In another bowl, combine fat-free Greek yogurt and vanilla protein powder. Add a splash of milk if a thinner consistency is desired.
Layer each piece of toast with the yogurt filling and extra cinnamon if desired.

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Welcome back to all things thanksgiving. My viral honey butter cornbread is the best cornbread recipe out there! Heres the recipe üíõüíõ ‚ñ¢ 2 cups yellow cornmeal ‚ñ¢ 2 cups all purpose flour ‚ñ¢ 1 can creamed corn 15 oz ‚ñ¢ 2 tablespoons baking powder ‚ñ¢ 1 teaspoon of salt, or more to taste ‚ñ¢ 1 cup granulated sugar ‚ñ¢ 2 large eggs ‚ñ¢ 2 cups milk ‚ñ¢ 2/3 cup vegetable oil Honey Butter ‚ñ¢ 1/2 cup honey ‚ñ¢ 1/2 cup butter #thanksgiving #honeybutter #cornbread

steps: Preheat the oven to 350¬∞F (175¬∞C).
In a large mixing bowl, combine the yellow cornmeal, all purpose flour, creamed corn, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together the granulated sugar, eggs, milk, and vegetable oil until well blended.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined; do not overmix.
Pour the batter into a greased baking dish or pan.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes or until golden brown and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
While the cornbread bakes, prepare the honey butter by mixing the honey and softened butter in a bowl until smooth.
Once the cornbread is done, remove it from the oven and let it cool slightly before serving with the honey butter.
extracted.title: Viral Honey Butter Cornbread

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: ‚á© Full Recipe ü•© ‚á©  Macros per 1 serving: Protein: 23g Carbs: 7g Fat: 26g Calories: 346 Ingredients (makes 4 equal serving): - 1lb thinly sliced ribeye raw (also labeled as Bulgogi meat at your local Korean market) - 1/2 large yellow onion - 1 tbsp honey - 1 tsp minced garlic - 4 tbsp soy sauce - 1 tbsp sesame oil - 2 tsp sesame seeds - 1/3 second spray oil - black pepper How to make it yourself: 1. Dice your yellow onions and green onions 2. In a bowl, combine your honey, minced garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, sesame seeds, and black pepper. 3. Add in your sliced meat and diced yellow onions into the bowl and mix well. Marinate for 30min-5 hours in the fridge for the best flavor. 4. On a pan coated with spray oil on medium heat, grill your bulgogi mix. Once cooked through, top it off with green onions and it‚Äôs best enjoyed with some rice and kimchi! üì©¬†Save this bulgogi recipe to make for later and if you make it, post it and tag me in it! I‚Äôd love to see how you liked the recipe :) #highproteinmeals #lowcalorierecipes #healthyrecipes #koreanfood #bulgogi #kbbq #weightlossfood

steps: Dice the yellow onion and chop the green onions.
In a bowl, combine honey, minced garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, sesame seeds, and black pepper.
Add sliced ribeye meat and diced yellow onions to the bowl and mix well.
Marinate the mixture in the fridge for 30 minutes to 5 hours for best flavor.
Heat a pan coated with spray oil on medium heat.
Grill the marinated bulgogi mix until cooked through.
Top it off with green onions and serve with rice and kimchi.

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: High Protein Honey Garlic Butter Chicken Mac n Cheese!üçóüçØüßÄ Absolutely one of the best combos, so indulgent, bursting with flavour and packed with 60g of protein! Macros Per Serving (4 Total) 597 Calories | 59g Protein | 52g Carbs | 16g Fat Ingredients (Makes 4) Honey Garlic Chicken - 800g Raw Chicken Breast cut into cubes - 1.5 Tsp Salt - 1 Tsp Black Pepper - 1 Tsp Chilli Flakes (leave it out if you don‚Äôt want it spicy) - 1.5 Tsp Garlic Powder - 1.5 Tsp Onion Powder - 1.5 Tep Paprika or Smoked Paprika - 2 Tsp Olive Oil - 30g Light Butter (Brand: Lurpak) for cooking + extra once cooked - 2 Tsp Minced Garlic - 30g Honey (15g Honey per batch of chicken) - Handful Fresh Chopped Parsley Get a pan on medium heat first then add butter. Let it melt then add your chicken (don‚Äôt overcrowd the pan). Cook for 4-5 mins on one side first till you get a nice golden brown crust. Then cook the other side for 3-4 mins more. Lower the heat completely when adding the extra butter, garlic and honey. Mix till well coated and sticky then set aside Garlic Mac n Cheese - Big Tbsp Minced Garlic - 300ml Skimmed Milk - 160g Light Cream Cheese (Brand: Philadelphia) - 1 Tsp Salt or to taste - 1/2 Tsp Black Pepper - 1 Tsp Smoked Paprika - 1/2 Tsp Nutmeg (adds a great deep flavour!) - 100g Low Fat Cheddar Cheese (You can use any low fat cheese you have available) - 220g Uncooked Macaroni Pasta or any pasta of your choice On medium low heat cook the minced garlic in the residue butter of the chicken for 2 mins till fragrant. Then add milk, cream cheese, spices. Mix this till completely smooth then lower the heat before adding the cheddar cheese. Stir till it melts then add your cooked macaroni and give it a good mix then Serve & ENJOY! . . . . #garlicbutter #honeygarlic #chicken #chickenrecipes #macncheese #macaroni #pasta #macandcheese #highprotein #mealprep #foodie #healthyrecipes #weightloss #lowcalorie #eathealthy #fitness #mealprepideas

steps: Get a pan on medium heat and add butter. Let it melt, then add the chicken (don't overcrowd the pan).
Cook for 4-5 minutes on one side until a nice golden brown crust forms.
Cook the other side for 3-4 minutes more.
Lower the heat completely when adding the extra butter, garlic, and honey.
Mix until well coated and sticky, then set aside.
In the same pan, cook the minced garlic in the residue butter from the chicken for 2 minutes until fragrant.
Add milk, cream cheese, salt, black pepper, smoked paprika, and nutmeg. Mix until completely smooth.
Lower the heat before adding the cheddar cheese. Stir until it melts.
Add the cooked macaroni to the cheese mixture and give it a good mix.
extracted.title: High Protein Honey Garlic Butter Chicken Mac n Cheese

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: "LAZY GIRL" CHICKEN THIGHS‚ú® use this foolproof technique for tender and juicy chicken thighs every time! Whenever a recipe calls for cooked chicken, 90% of the time this is how I'm going to prepare it. No oil, 2 ingredients (four if we count S&P but I don't think those count), under 30 minutes. You're going to LOVE this recipe! Recipe below or you can find it on my blog at the link in my bio Ingredients:  1 1/2 lbs of chicken thighs, boneless and skinless salt and pepper to season (about 1/4 tsp salt per thigh, and 1/8 tsp pepper) about 1/2 cup of low sodium chicken broth or bone broth Directions:  Heat a large cast iron skillet over medium high heat While the skillet heats up, season the chicken thighs generously on both sides with salt and pepper  Add the chicken thighs to the dry skillet, making sure not to overcrowd the pan, and cook, undisturbed, for 10-12 minutes or until they are white around the edges and are no longer sticking to the pan. It's important not to move them around while cooking because you want a nice golden crust to form.  Flip the chicken once it can easily release from the pan and cook for another 5-7 minutes. Lower the pan heat to medium low and add 1/4 cup of chicken broth, scraping up any chicken bits as the broth deglazes the pan, then add another 1/4 cup to cover the bottom on the pan in a thin layer. Allow the sauce to reduce until there is only a thin, sticky glaze over the bottom of the pan, tossing the chicken in the sauce as you go, for another 3-5 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet and allow to rest for 5 minutes before slicing.  Slice into your juicy chicken thighs, serve (with the pan drippings), and ENJOY!  Follow for more simple, healthy recipes!ü§ç . . #easychickenthighs #bestchickenthighs #juicychickenthighs #easyrecipe #weeknightrecipe #popularrecipe #lazygirlchickenthighs #lazygirlrecipes #howtocookchicken #howto #asmrrecipe #asmrfood #eattolive

steps: Heat a large cast iron skillet over medium high heat.
Season the chicken thighs generously on both sides with salt and pepper.
Add the chicken thighs to the dry skillet, making sure not to overcrowd the pan.
Cook, undisturbed, for 10-12 minutes or until they are white around the edges and no longer sticking to the pan.
Flip the chicken once it can easily release from the pan and cook for another 5-7 minutes.
Lower the heat to medium low and add 1/4 cup of chicken broth, scraping up any chicken bits to deglaze the pan.
Add another 1/4 cup of chicken broth to cover the bottom of the pan in a thin layer.
Allow the sauce to reduce until there is only a thin, sticky glaze over the bottom of the pan, tossing the chicken in the sauce for another 3-5 minutes.
Remove the chicken from the skillet and allow to rest for 5 minutes before slicing.
Slice the juicy chicken thighs and serve with the pan drippings.
extracted.title: LAZY GIRL CHICKEN THIGHS

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Cowboy Butter Steak Bites - Rib Eye  Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes and Caramelized Onions  Recipe, Cowboy butter 1 stick unsalted Butter 2 tsp Paprika 1/2 tsp Cayenne  1 tsp Chilli flakes 2 cloves Garlic - crushed  1 tablespoon Dijon Mustard 1 tablespoon chopped Chives  1/2 tablespoon chopped parsley 1 Lemon - zest and juice  1 tsp Salt  1/2 tsp Black pepper  Method, Melt butter in stainless steel pan on low heat. Add all ingredients listed above and whisk well to combine. Remove from heat and set aside at room temperature until ready to serve.  For the Steak, I used ribeye. Slice into large bite sized pieces. Season heavily with salt and pepper then sear on all sides in a stainless steel pan. Remove the meat from the pan and coat with your cowboy butter. Serve with mashed potatoes and caramelized or fried onions. Enjoy  #cowboybutter #steakbites #ribeye #mashedpotatoes #easyrecipes #torontofood @Benji

steps: Melt butter in a stainless steel pan over low heat.
Add paprika, cayenne, chili flakes, crushed garlic, Dijon mustard, chopped chives, chopped parsley, lemon zest, lemon juice, salt, and black pepper. Whisk to combine well.
Remove from heat and set aside at room temperature until ready to serve.
Season ribeye pieces heavily with salt and pepper.
Sear ribeye in a stainless steel pan on all sides until browned.
Remove the ribeye from the pan and coat with the prepared cowboy butter.
Serve the cowboy butter steak bites with mashed potatoes and caramelized onions.

Instructions: - Open the biscuits, and split in half so there are now 16 biscuit portions. - mix the sugar, and cinnamon in a shallow bowl, and melt the butter into another bowl. - Add pumpkin puree to separate bowl and add in 1-2 tbsp of the cinnamon sugar mixture to combine.  - Dip each piece of biscuit in the butter, and then the cinnamon sugar until full coated. - Stack the biscuits on top of each other with about 1/2-1tsp of pumpkin puree between each biscuit and place sideways into a loaf pan. - Bake at 350 for 35-40 mins until baked through.  ‚Ä¢ #pullapartbread#pumpkinseason#pumpkin#cannedbiscuits#fallrecipes#fallbaking

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: CHICKEN & CHORIZO ONE PAN RICE  20 min 1 pan dinner for 605 cals  Ingredients for four:  - 1 diced onion   - 2tbsp tomato puree   - 400g diced chicken breast  - 140g diced chorizo  - 400-500ml stock (you want double the amount of water to uncooked rice)  - 260g rice  - 3 crushed garlic cloves  - Tbsp smoked paprika, garlic granules and onion granules  - 80g reduced fat grated cheese  Firstly fry off your onion, and chorizo. After a few mins add your garlic and fry for 30 secs. Then add in your chicken, garlic granules and paprika once your chicken has some colour all over. Then add in the tomato puree.  Add in your uncooked rice, stir for another minute or so and then add your stock, bring this to a boil. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low, cover the pan and leave to cook for 15/20 mins. Stir occasionally!  Once the rice is done, stir through some parsley and scatter over the cheese!  serve with broccoli üòã ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ #easydinnerideas #homecooking #weightlossjourney #healthydinnerideas #onepanmeal #onepotmeal #chickenandrice #chickenandchorizo #spicyrice #healthyeating #chickenandchorizorice #foodblogger #foodoptimising

steps: Heat a pan over medium heat and fry the diced onion and chorizo until the onion is soft.
Add the crushed garlic and fry for 30 seconds more.
Add the diced chicken and season with garlic granules and smoked paprika, cooking until the chicken is browned on all sides.
Stir in the tomato puree and mix well with the chicken and chorizo.
Add the uncooked rice to the pan and stir for another minute to incorporate.
Pour in the stock, bringing the mixture to a boil.
Once boiling, reduce the heat to low, cover the pan, and leave to cook for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally until the rice is done.
Once cooked, stir through some chopped parsley and scatter the grated cheese over the top before serving with broccoli.
extracted.title: Chicken & Chorizo One Pan Rice

If too wet, add more oat flour slowly. ‚ñ™Ô∏èReserve about a 1/4 cup of the mixture (for the topping) ‚ñ™Ô∏èPour the remaining mixture into a loaf tin and use your fingers to really press it together.  ‚ñ™Ô∏èPour over the blueberry mixture, spread evenly.  ‚ñ™Ô∏èCrumble on the remaining oat mixture ‚ñ™Ô∏èRefrigerate until set #blueberries #oatbars #healthyrecipes #vegan #easyrecipes #recipe #healthysnacks

steps: Grease or line a loaf tin.
In a pan over medium heat, add the blueberries and water.
Bring to a boil on medium high heat, then reduce to medium low and simmer for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally and slightly mashing the berries.

In a bowl, mix together the maple syrup, coconut oil, peanut butter, oats, and oat flour until the mixture holds together. Adjust consistency by adding more peanut butter if too dry or oat flour if too wet.
Reserve about a 1/4 cup of the mixture for topping.
Pour the remaining mixture into the loaf tin and press it together firmly with your fingers.
Spread the blueberry mixture evenly over the pressed oat mixture.
Crumble on the reserved oat mixture on top of the blueberries.
Refrigerate until set.

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Easy high protein bagels ü•Øüòã I‚Äôve made bagels a few different ways before, but this is BY FAR the easiest way to make them! You only need a few simple ingredients, they don‚Äôt need to rise, you don‚Äôt need to boil them‚Ä¶ they are just SO EASY! And turn out absolutely delicious, trust me! üôå Each bagel also has 10g of protein which I love because it makes them a little more well-rounded and filling!  Makes 4 bagels: ~153 calories, 10g protein, 26g carb, 1g fat each  Ingredients:  - 1 cup all purpose flour  - 1 1/2 tsp baking powder - 1/4 tsp salt  - 1 cup plain nonfat greek yogurt  - 1 egg - 1 tbsp water - Everything bagel seasoning How to:  - Add the flour, baking powder and salt to a bowl and stir together.  - Add the greek yogurt and stir until the dough starts to come together.  - Knead the dough into a ball, then sprinkle flour on to your counter and knead the dough for 2-3 minutes until it‚Äôs smooth. You can sprinkle on extra flour if the dough is too sticky.  - Slice the dough into 4 pieces, then roll each one out into a log then form into a circle.  - Whisk together the egg and water and brush a light layer onto each bagel. You can leave them plain or dip in everything bagel seasoning.  - Line air fryer basket with parchment paper, add the bagels (try not to let them touch).  - Air fry at 350F for 20 minutes, flipping halfway so both sides get golden brown. Or bake in the oven at 350F for 30 mins! - Let cool for a few minutes and enjoy! ü´∂ #healthyrecipes #easyrecipe #highprotein #bagels #highproteinbagels #easyrecipe #healthycooking #breakfast

steps: Add the flour, baking powder, and salt to a bowl and stir together.
Add the Greek yogurt and stir until the dough starts to come together.
Knead the dough into a ball, then sprinkle flour on to your counter and knead the dough for 2-3 minutes until it‚Äôs smooth. You can sprinkle on extra flour if the dough is too sticky.
Slice the dough into 4 pieces, then roll each one out into a log and form into a circle.
Whisk together the egg and water and brush a light layer onto each bagel. You can leave them plain or dip them in everything bagel seasoning.
Line the air fryer basket with parchment paper, add the bagels (try not to let them touch).
Air fry at 350F for 20 minutes, flipping halfway so both sides get golden brown. Or bake in the oven at 350F for 30 mins!
Let cool for a few minutes and enjoy!
extracted.title: Easy High Protein Bagels

recipes.rawText:
The best crispy potatoes #potato #potatoes #crispy #crispypotatoes #dip #fries #everydayisfeastday

For the sauce:
1/4 cup bbq sauce
1/2 cup mayo
1 tbsp cider vinegar or lemon
1/2 tsp onion powder
1/2 tsp garlic powder
2 tbsp honey
2 tbsp dijon mustard

SPOKEN CONTENT (from audio):

Hey, I'm going to show you how to make the best crispy potatoes you ever put into your face. Man! And we're not going to use a deep fryer. First you're going to wash your potatoes. I did four. Then you're going to drizzle them with enough olive oil just to coat. Some kosher salt. I like to use plenty of kosher salt because I find that makes the interior of the potato nice and fluffy. Lay your potatoes out onto a small half sheet tray or other pan that can go into the oven. Then we're going to bake these at 375 degrees for about 45 minutes to one hour or until they're fully baked. Oh, this is also my favorite way to make baked potatoes. Then once your baked potatoes are done, you want to get them all the way down to room temperature or even better yet if you have the space, stick them in the refrigerator. By allowing your potatoes to fully cool, it's going to allow the starches to gelatinize and give us a much better texture when we finish these up. So you're just going to halve your potatoes, then cut them into wedges. I like to cut the halves into thirds or quarters depending on the size of the potato, but you're going to end up with something like this. Then in a pan over medium heat, you're going to put enough oil just to come up about a quarter inch in your pan. When your oil is hot, it'll look sort of shimmery. We use one potato wedge as a test. You're going to set it down in the oil on the cut side and you want to hear it sizzle right away. If it does not sizzle right away, it's going to want to stick to your pan. Your potatoes will start to turn brown on one side. You'll be able to see this side from the oil. So once that happens, after maybe two, three minutes, we're going to flip them all. Then after a few more minutes and your potatoes are golden brown on the other side, you can transfer these to your wire rack. Then straight out of the oil, I like to hit fried stuff with a little pinch of kosher salt. Then while the rest of our potatoes fry back there, we're going to make a little sauce. You're going to use some of your favorite barbecue sauce, mayonnaise, some onion powder, garlic powder, a little cider vinegar. You can use white distilled vinegar or lemon juice and a drizzle of honey. You know what? Let's put a little bit of Dijon in here too. And I'll list all the quantities of these ingredients below. Plus I put full versions of most of the recipes I make on my sub stack page. Serve these things nice and hot and follow me if you've got a big date night coming up or you're just getting ready for football season.


Testing fixed schema

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.
Wash and halve the potatoes. Rub them with olive oil and sprinkle with kosher salt.
Lay the potatoes on a half sheet tray and bake for about 45 minutes to 1 hour.
Once baked, cool the potatoes to room temperature or refrigerate them to allow starches to gelatinize.
Cut the cooled potatoes into wedges.
In a pan over medium heat, add oil to a depth of about 1/4 inch.
When oil is hot, add potato wedges cut-side down. Ensure they sizzle when placed in the oil.
Brown one side for 2-3 minutes, then flip to brown the other side.
Transfer the browned potatoes to a wire rack and sprinkle with kosher salt.
In a bowl, mix together BBQ sauce, mayonnaise, cider vinegar (or lemon), onion powder, garlic powder, honey, and dijon mustard to create the sauce.
extracted.title: The Best Crispy Potatoes

Grilled Cheese Breakfast Burritos (Makes 10 Burritos)  Macros Per Burrito: - 450 Calories - 65g Protein  - 29g Carbs - 13g Fat Ingredients:  - 40oz Lean Ground Beef (96/4) (1135g) - 1 Taco Seasoning Packet (1oz) (28g) - 0.25 Cup Red Enchilada Sauce (60g) - 2 Tbsps Minced Garlic (20g) - 0.5 Cup Diced White Onion (100g) - 12 Eggs (720g) - 1 Cup Blended Cottage Cheese (225g) - 6.5 Cups Fat Free Cheddar Cheese (730g) - Fresh Chives (10g) - 1 Tbsp Garlic Salt (15g) - 10 Low Calorie Tortillas  Sriracha Mayo: - 8 Tbsps Light Mayo (120g) - 4 Tbsps Sriracha (60g) - 0.25 Cup Lemon Juice (60g) - 0.5 Tbsp Garlic Salt (7g) Additional Notes: - Add about 0.5 Cup of cheese onto the pan per burrito when making the crispy cheese shell.  - To reheat the burritos from frozen, follow these steps. steps: In a large skillet, cook the lean ground beef until browned.
Add the taco seasoning, red enchilada sauce, minced garlic, and diced onion; stir well and cook until onions are translucent.

recipes.rawText:
Professional Chef makes Hamburger Helper #chicken #homemade #dinner #easydinner #everydayisfeastday

Hamburger (chicken in this case) helper...great for a busy weeknight dinner! You can totally customize this to what you have on hand/what your family likes.
2 pieces chopped bacon
1 lb ground chicken (or other meat)
2 pinches kosher salt
1 pinch black pepper
1 each onion, small dice
4-6 garlic cloves, minced
1 tsp smoked paprika
1/2 tsp onion powder
1/2 tsp garlic powder
1 tbsp dried or fresh parsley
1 tsp dried oregano
1 tbsp tomato paste
1 cup chicken stock
1/4 cup cream cheese
1 cup heavy cream
1 lb shredded or grated cheese
1 lb of your favorite pasta

SPOKEN CONTENT (from audio):

Hey, here's how a professional chef makes homemade Hamburger Helper. Awesome. In a pan over medium to high heat, we're going to add about two pieces of chopped bacon. Leave your bacon a minute or two to start rendering the fat out. You can also cook this bacon however long you want. Then we're going to add, this is about a pound, to a pound and a half of ground chicken. I know the name Hamburger Helper, but I had some boneless skinless chicken thighs that I needed to use up, so I cubed them and I pulsed them in my food processor to make my own ground chicken. Then I have a pinch of kosher salt, a pinch of black pepper. We're going to add one onion that we have peeled and small diced, and about four to six minced garlic cloves. This is a spice blend. I'll list all these ingredients down in the comments, but also we're doing this with this meat because traditionally you would use ground beef, but you can use anything that you want. This can be Italian sausage. If you have leftover short ribs, you can do that. If you butcher a lot of meats at home, you can save all the scraps, stick them in the freezer. Then when you have enough, you can make some homemade Hamburger Helper. Once your meat is all fully cooked, you're going to add about a tablespoon of tomato paste. This can also be chopped tomatoes or even marinara sauce. Stir in your tomato paste and cook maybe another 60 seconds. Then this step is optional, but if you really want to intensify the flavors, add about a cup of chicken stock. Use it to scrape all the brown bits off the bottom of the pan, and we're going to simmer this until there's almost no liquid left. Our chicken stock is almost entirely reduced out. We're going to add about a quarter of a cup of cream cheese, about one cup of heavy cream, then bring this to a gentle simmer, and you're going to add about one pound total of your favorite cheese. This is shredded cheddar and parmesan, and I have my heat on low just to melt this cheese in here. Once all your cheese is melted in, this is about one pound of cooked elbow macaroni. You can use any kind of pasta you want. I also have a splash of the pasta water in here. Again, my heat is on low, and if you want to make this and save it for a later date, before you add your shredded cheese, you can freeze this mixture. Then when you want to eat it, you just thaw it, heat it up, melt in your shredded cheese, and cook your favorite pasta. Serve this immediately, and follow me if this is going straight into your busy weeknight rotation.


Restored with Whisper

steps: In a pan over medium to high heat, add chopped bacon and cook until it starts rendering fat.
Add ground chicken and season with kosher salt and black pepper.
Add diced onion and minced garlic to the pan, stirring until the onion is translucent.
Stir in tomato paste and cook for another minute.
Add chicken stock, scraping the bottom of the pan to remove brown bits, and simmer until almost no liquid remains.
Mixin cream cheese and heavy cream, bringing to a gentle simmer.
Add shredded cheese and mix until melted.
Incorporate cooked pasta into the cheese mixture and stir well.
extracted.title: Homemade Hamburger Helper

recipes.rawText: FRIED CHICKEN BUNS WITH CHEESE #food #recipe #chicken #buns #bread #cheese #homemade #fyp #foryoupage #foryou DOUGH 150 ml milk (lukewarm) 70 ml water (lukewarm) 7 g instant yeast (1 tablespoon) 12 g honey 400 g flour (all-purpose or bread flour) 7 g salt (1‚Öô teaspoon) 30 g unsalted butter CHICKEN FILLING 25 ml olive oil 425 g chicken thighs 2 g cayenne powder (‚Öî teaspoon) 2 g black pepper (‚Öî teaspoon) 3 g onion powder (1 teaspoon) 2 g garlic powder (‚Öî teaspoon) 75 ml water 5 g cornstarch 10 g soy sauce 15 g ketjap manis (Indonesian sweet soy sauce) 25 g sweet chili sauce 125 g grated cheese 100 g spring onion SERVE WITH cheese cheddar cheese Instructions Put the lukewarm milk, lukewarm water, yeast, and honey in a large bowl. Mix well and let it sit for 5 minutes. Add the flour, salt, and butter. Knead the dough for 10‚Äì12 minutes until smooth and elastic. Cover and let it rise for 1 hour in a warm spot, or until doubled in size. Heat the olive oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add the chicken pieces, cayenne pepper, black pepper, onion powder, and garlic powder. Cook for 5‚Äì6 minutes. Meanwhile, mix the water and cornstarch in a small bowl until smooth. Add the soy sauce, ketjap manis, sweet chili sauce, and the cornstarch mixture to the chicken. Let it simmer for 5 minutes. Add the grated cheese and stir until melted. Mix in the spring onion. Let the filling cool completely. Deflate the risen dough and divide into 10 equal pieces of about 65 g each. Shape into balls. Roll one dough ball into a flat circle on a floured surface. Place a slice of cheese and about 60 g of the chicken filling on top. Fold in half and seal the edges well. Place the buns on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Let them rise for 30 minutes in a warm place. Heat a layer of sunflower oil (about 2 cm) in a frying pan to 175 ¬∞C / 350 ¬∞F. Fry the buns on both sides until golden brown. Drain on paper towels.

steps: Put the lukewarm milk, lukewarm water, yeast, and honey in a large bowl. Mix well and let it sit for 5 minutes.
Add the flour, salt, and butter. Knead the dough for 10-12 minutes until smooth and elastic.
Cover the dough and let it rise for 1 hour in a warm spot, or until doubled in size.
Heat the olive oil in a frying pan over medium heat.
Add the chicken pieces, cayenne pepper, black pepper, onion powder, and garlic powder. Cook for 5-6 minutes.
Meanwhile, mix the water and cornstarch in a small bowl until smooth. Add the soy sauce, ketjap manis, sweet chili sauce, and the cornstarch mixture to the chicken. Let it simmer for 5 minutes.
Add the grated cheese and stir until melted. Mix in the spring onion. Let the filling cool completely.
Deflate the risen dough and divide it into 10 equal pieces of about 65 g each. Shape into balls.
Roll one dough ball into a flat circle on a floured surface. Place a slice of cheese and about 60 g of the chicken filling on top. Fold in half and seal the edges well.
Place the buns on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Let them rise for 30 minutes in a warm place.
Heat a layer of sunflower oil (about 2 cm) in a frying pan to 175 C / 350 F. Fry the buns on both sides until golden brown. Drain on paper towels.
extracted.title: Fried Chicken Buns with Cheese

recipes.rawText: At this point, I might as well change my handle to ‚ÄòCottage Cheese Queen‚Äô‚Ä¶ But can you blame me?! These high-protein cheesecake jars take 5 minutes, come in endless flavors, and actually keep me full. This week‚Äôs obsession? Cinnamon Roll Cheesecake Jars‚Äîbecause if I‚Äôm meal-prepping dessert, I‚Äôm doing it right. Drop a üßÄ in the comments if you‚Äôre also in your cottage cheese era. And if you‚Äôre still skeptical‚Ä¶ just try it. I‚Äôll be here waiting for your ‚Äòyou were right‚Äô DM. Recipe is down below- let me know if you try!  Ingredients: For the Crust:‚Ä®1 cup graham cracker crumbs (or cinnamon cereal crushed) For the Cheesecake Filling:‚Ä®1.5 cups cottage cheese ‚Ä®1/2 cup Greek yogurt ‚Ä®1/4 cup maple syrup or honey‚Ä®1 tsp vanilla bean paste  For the Cinnamon Swirl:‚Ä®2 tbsp coconut sugar ‚Ä®1/4 cup greek yogurt‚Ä®1 tsp cinnamon  Add crushed graham crackers to the bottom of each jar, (will link these in my story and add to my march highlight) then fill each one with the blended cottage cheese mixture. Mix together the cinnamon swirl ingredients, add to a pipping bag and make a swirl on top. And literally that‚Äôs it!  #cottagecheese #proteindesserts #proteinrecipes #healthydesserts

steps: Add crushed graham crackers or cinnamon cereal to the bottom of each jar.
Blend together cottage cheese, Greek yogurt, maple syrup or honey, and vanilla bean paste.
Fill each jar with the blended cottage cheese mixture.
Mix together the coconut sugar, Greek yogurt, and cinnamon to create the cinnamon swirl.
Add the cinnamon swirl mixture to a piping bag and make a swirl on top of each jar.

recipes.rawText: BBQ Cheeseburger sliders are an easy weeknight dinner the whole family will love!  INGREDIENTS 12 count King‚Äôs Hawaiian Rolls 1 lb ground beef 1/2 tsp each of salt and pepper 1 tsp each of garlic powder, onion powder, and smoked paprika   1 tbsp minced garlic  2 tbsp BBQ sauce  Pepper jack cheese slices Shredded colby jack cheese   Crispy fried onions  6 pieces of bacon, cooked and crumbled  2 tbsp melted butter  Sesame seeds  INSTRUCTIONS Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F.  Cook 1 lb of ground beef in a skillet over medium-high heat. Season with salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, and smoked paprika. Once the ground beef is browned, drain any extra grease from the skillet. Add the minced garlic and BBQ sauce. Stir well.  Slice Hawaiian Rolls in half and put the bottom of the rolls in a greased baking dish or on a sheet pan.  Add a layer of pepper jack cheese. Add the ground beef on top of the cheese. Top the ground beef with shredded colby jack cheese, some crumbled bacon, and crispy fried onions. Top with a little bit more BBQ sauce if desired!  Put the tops of the slider rolls on and brush them with melted butter. Sprinkle sesame seeds on top. Bake at 350 degrees F for about 10-15 minutes. Enjoy! #easyrecipes #appetizers #dinner #cheeseburger

steps: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F.
Cook 1 lb of ground beef in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Season the beef with salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, and smoked paprika.
Once the beef is browned, drain any extra grease from the skillet.
Add minced garlic and BBQ sauce to the skillet and stir well.
Slice Hawaiian Rolls in half and place the bottom halves in a greased baking dish or on a sheet pan.
Add a layer of pepper jack cheese on top of the rolls.
Spread the ground beef mixture on top of the cheese.
Top the beef with shredded colby jack cheese, crumbled bacon, and crispy fried onions.
Drizzle with more BBQ sauce if desired.
Place the tops of the slider rolls on, brush them with melted butter, and sprinkle sesame seeds on top.
Bake in the oven for 10-15 minutes.
extracted.title: BBQ Cheeseburger Sliders

recipes.rawText: Cinnamon pumpkin crumble bread ‚ú®üçÇ I have so many fall recipes that I tested over the summer and can‚Äôt wait to share! Also layer the sugar mixture in the middle of the loaf, got too caught up and ended up adding it to the top. Ingredients  - 250g all-purpose flour (2 cups) - 110g dark brown sugar (1/2 cup) - 105g granulated sugar (1/2 cup) - 60ml buttermilk or milk (1/4 cup) - 113g unsalted butter, melted (1/2 cup, 1 stick) - 12oz pumpkin puree  - 6g baking powder (1 tsp) - 6g baking soda (1 tsp) - 2 eggs - 1 tsp vanilla extract  - 2 tsp cinnamon  - 1 tsp pumpkin spice  - 1/2 tsp ground ginger  - 1/4 tsp ground nutmeg  - 1/2 tsp salt Crumble - 115g all-purpose flour (1/2 cup + 1 tbsp) - 55g granulated sugar (1/4 cup) - 40g brown sugar (3 tbsp) - 58g unsalted butter, melted (1/4 cup) - 1/2 tsp cinnamon  - 1/4 tsp all spice  - 1/4 tsp ground nutmeg  Cinnamon mixture - 55g sugar (1/4 cup) - 58g unsalted butter, melted (1/4 cup) - 1 tsp cinnamon  Icing - 50g powder sugar (1/3 cup + 2 tbsp) - 1/2 tsp pumpkin spice  - 1/2 tsp cinnamon - 1 tbsp milk  Instructions - Preheat oven to 325¬∞F (165¬∞C). Grease and line a 1.5 pound loaf pan with parchment paper. - In a small bowl, combine flour, brown sugar, granulated sugar, allspice, nutmeg and cinnamon. - Add melted butter and mix it into a crumbly mixture. - Place in the fridge while preparing the batter (this keeps it from melting too fast). - In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt. - In a large bowl, whisk pumpkin puree, melted butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, and buttermilk  until smooth.  - Add spices (cinnamon, nutmeg, pumpkin spice, and ginger.) - Gently fold dry ingredients into wet mixture until just combined. Do not overmix. - Pour half batter into prepared loaf pan. Add cinnamon butter mixture spread evenly and add the remaining batter.  - Evenly sprinkle the crumble topping over the batter. - Bake for 80-90 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean (a few moist crumbs are okay). - If the crumble starts to brown too quickly, tent loosely with foil halfway through. - Let bread cool in pan for 15 minutes, then lift out and place on a wire rack. - Once bread cool add icing drizzle.  ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ #fallrecipes #baking #pumpkinseason #bakingrecipe #Recipe

steps: Preheat oven to 325 F (165 C). Grease and line a 1.5 pound loaf pan with parchment paper.
In a small bowl, combine flour, brown sugar, granulated sugar, allspice, nutmeg, and cinnamon.
Add melted butter and mix into a crumbly mixture. Place in fridge while preparing the batter.
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
In a large bowl, whisk pumpkin puree, melted butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, and buttermilk until smooth.
Add spices (cinnamon, nutmeg, pumpkin spice, and ginger).
Gently fold dry ingredients into the wet mixture until just combined, do not overmix.
Pour half the batter into prepared loaf pan. Add cinnamon butter mixture spread evenly and then add the remaining batter.
Evenly sprinkle the crumble topping over the batter.
Bake for 80-90 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean (a few moist crumbs are okay).
If the crumble starts to brown too quickly, tent loosely with foil halfway through.
Let bread cool in pan for 15 minutes, then lift out and place on a wire rack.
Once bread cool, add icing drizzle.
extracted.title: Cinnamon Pumpkin Crumble Bread

recipes.rawText: HEALTHY BANANA BREAD üçå This banana bread tastes like your classic favorite but so healthy & nourishing! Perfect for breakfast, preworkout, or anytime snack. Easy to make, soft, moist, and packed with protein.  MACROS (for one piece, 1/9 of loaf) 158 Calories | 8g protein | 23g carbs | 4.6g fat INGREDIENTS  - 300g ripe banana (about 3 bananas) - 3 eggs - 1 tbsp vanilla  - *optional* 2 tbsp honey or maple syrup if you like sweeter bread  - 160g or 2 cups oat flour (regular oats are okay) - 2 tsp baking powder  - 1/2 tsp baking soda - pinch of salt  - few dashes of cinnamon  - 1 scoop (31 g) protein powder My favorite is @PEScience !! *If you don‚Äôt have protein powder add 20g more of oat flour* - 1/4 cup chocolate chips  INSTRUCTIONS  1. Add bananas to a bowl, mash well 2. Add eggs & vanilla to banana and mix, add sweetener (if using) 3. Add oat flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon and protein powder (if using) and mix well  4. Add in chocolate chips, mix again 5. Line a 8x8 baking pan with parchment or lightly grease pan 6. Spread mix evenly into pan, top with a few extra chocolate chips if you‚Äôd like  7. Bake @350 for 30-35 minutes  8. Cut into slices & enjoy ü§ç #bananabread #healthybreakfastideas #highproteinrecipes #lowcalorierecipes #mealprepideas #proteinbaking #preworkoutsnack #EasyRecipes #lowcalorie  #HealthyBananaBread #creatorsearchinsights

steps: Add bananas to a bowl, mash well.
Add eggs and vanilla to banana and mix, then add sweetener if using.
Add oat flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and protein powder (if using) and mix well.
Add in chocolate chips and mix again.
Line an 8x8 baking pan with parchment or lightly grease the pan.
Spread mix evenly into the pan and top with a few extra chocolate chips if desired.
Bake at 350¬∞F for 30-35 minutes.
Cut into slices and enjoy.

Recipe 2 eggs 1 cup coconut sugar (or sub brown sugar) ¬æ cup natural creamy peanut butter ¬º cup melted and cooled coconut oil 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 1 cup packed fine almond flour ¬Ω cup rolled oats ¬Ω teaspoon baking soda ¬º teaspoon salt ¬Ω cup mix of semi sweet & dark chocolate chunks (more for the top, if desired) Fancy Maldon Salt, for sprinkling on top Combine the wet ingredients and mix until smooth. Add the dry, mix. Add chocolate chips, saving some for the top. In a greased or lined 8x8 pan, add the mixture and evenly smooth it out. Bake for 20-22 mins at 350¬∞F just until the edges are golden! steps: Preheat the oven to 350¬∞F.

In another bowl, mix the dry ingredients: almond flour, rolled oats, baking soda, and salt.

recipes.rawText: Brown Sugar Pumpkin Crumb Cake ü´† Moist pumpkin streusel cake layered with brown sugar crumble and topped with a spiced glaze. An easy fall dessert. Recipe below! 1 (8-inch square or 9-inch round) cake Ingredients  Streusel 1 cup (packed) / 200 g light brown sugar 1 cup / 128 g all-purpose flour 2 teaspoons pumpkin spice blend Pinch of salt ¬Ω cup / 113 g unsalted butter, cold and cubed For the Pumpkin Cake 1 cup (packed) / 200 g light brown sugar 2 large eggs, room temp. 1 cup / 230 g canned pumpkin pur√©e ¬º cup / 56 g unsalted butter, melted ¬º cup / 60 g sour cream 1 tsp vanilla paste (or extract) 1 tablespoon pumpkin spice blend ¬Ω teaspoon fine sea salt 1 teaspoon baking powder ¬Ω teaspoon baking soda 1 ¬Ω cups / 190 g all-purpose flour For the Glaze (optional) ¬æ cup / 75 g confectioners‚Äô sugar Pinch of salt 1/4 teaspoon pumpkin spice  4 teaspoons milk  Directions: Make the streusel: In a medium bowl, combine brown sugar, flour, pumpkin spice, and salt. Cut in the cold butter with a pastry cutter or your fingers until crumbly. Refrigerate while you prepare the cake. Prepare the cake batter: Heat oven to 350¬∞F (175¬∞C). Spray an 8-inch square or 9-inch round pan with nonstick spray. In a large bowl, whisk together the brown sugar and eggs until smooth. Add pumpkin pur√©e, melted butter, sour cream, pumpkin spice, vanilla, and salt. Mix well. Sprinkle baking powder and baking soda over the mixture, whisk to combine, then gently fold in flour until just combined (do not overmix). Assemble: Spread half of the batter into the prepared pan. Sprinkle with half of the streusel. Add the remaining batter and top with the rest of the streusel. Bake: Bake for 35‚Äì45 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. Glaze (optional): In a small bowl, whisk together confectioners‚Äô sugar, pumpkin spice, salt, and just enough milk to reach drizzling consistency. Drizzle over cooled cake. https://www.jessiedaye.com/all-recipes/2025/9/3/pumpkin-streusel-cake-with-brown-sugar-crumble-and-spiced-glaze #dessert #easyrecipes #halloween #fall #pumpkin

steps: Make the streusel: In a medium bowl, combine brown sugar, flour, pumpkin spice, and salt. Cut in the cold butter with a pastry cutter or your fingers until crumbly. Refrigerate while you prepare the cake.

Prepare the cake batter: Heat oven to 350 F (175 C). Spray an 8-inch square or 9-inch round pan with nonstick spray. In a large bowl, whisk together the brown sugar and eggs until smooth. Add pumpkin pur√©e, melted butter, sour cream, pumpkin spice, vanilla, and salt. Mix well.
Sprinkle baking powder and baking soda over the mixture, whisk to combine, then gently fold in flour until just combined (do not overmix).
Assemble: Spread half of the batter into the prepared pan. Sprinkle with half of the streusel. Add the remaining batter and top with the rest of the streusel.
Bake: Bake for 35-45 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Glaze (optional): In a small bowl, whisk together confectioners sugar, pumpkin spice, salt, and just enough milk to reach drizzling consistency. Drizzle over cooled cake.

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Steak bites and Mashed potatoes ü•©ü•î  These two were made for each other, the peppercorn cream sauce is what really sets it off! Enjoy!  Full Ingredient List:  1-1.5 lb steak bites  1-2 tsp garlic powder  1-2 tsp black pepper  1.5-3 tsp salt (optional)  1-2 garlic cloves  2 tbsp butter  For mashed potatoes:  6-8 medium sized yukon gold potatoes peeled  1/4-1/2 cup heavy cream  1/2 stick butter  1/4 cup sour cream  1 tbsp garlic paste  Salt to taste Pepper to taste  For peppercorn sauce:  1/4 cup finely diced onions or shallots  1 medium garlic clove  15-20 crushed peppercorns  2-3 dashes Worcestershire sauce  1-2 tsp flour  Salt to taste (optional)  Chives to garnish #steakbites #mashedpotatoes #eatwitzo

steps: Season steak bites with garlic powder, black pepper, and salt.
In a skillet, melt butter over medium-high heat and add steak bites.
Sear steak bites until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add diced onions or shallots and minced garlic; saut√© until soft.
Add crushed peppercorns and Worcestershire sauce, mixing well.
Sprinkle flour into the sauce, stirring to combine; cook for an additional minute.
Slowly pour in heavy cream while stirring, letting sauce thicken. Adjust salt to taste.
For mashed potatoes, boil peeled yukon gold potatoes in salted water until soft, about 15-20 minutes.
Drain potatoes and return to pot; add heavy cream, butter, sour cream, garlic paste, salt, and pepper. Mash until smooth and creamy.
Serve steak bites topped with peppercorn sauce and a side of mashed potatoes, garnished with chives.
extracted.title: Steak Bites and Mashed Potatoes with Peppercorn Cream Sauce

recipes.rawText: Cinnamon Roll Sugar Cookies - **More details are written on my blog linked in my bio if you want to print the recipe! I highly recommend reading it there to make following the recipe easier ‚ò∫Ô∏è Cookie Dough Ingredients - - 1 1/4 cup all-purpose flour (166g) - 1/2 tsp ground cinnamon - 1/4 tsp baking powder - 1/4 tsp fine salt - 1/2 tsp baking soda - 1/2 cup room temperature unsalted butter (NOT SOFTENED!!! If your butter is too soft/warm when making the dough, your cookies will spread too much) (113g) - 1/2 cup granulated sugar (105g) - 2 tbsp light or dark brown sugar (20g) - 1 tsp pure vanilla extract (add more or less to taste) - 1 large room temperature egg Cinnamon Filling Ingredients - - 2 tbsp unsalted softened butter (30g) - 2 1/2 tbsp packed light or dark brown sugar (42g) - 2 1/4 tsp all-purpose flour - 1 1/2 tsp ground cinnamon (add more or less to taste) Cookie Dough Instructions - - In a medium mixing bowl, cream together the room temperature butter (not softened or melted!!! Room temp!!!), granulated sugar, and brown sugar. I like to do this with a rubber spatula and mix well until it‚Äôs smooth. You can also use a stand mixer with a paddle attachment or an electric hand mixer.  - Add the egg and vanilla extract and mix until very well combined.  - In a separate bowl, whisk together the dry ingredients.  - Add the dry ingredients to the wet and begin mixing slowly with your rubber spatula. Mix until everything is just combined and remember to never over-mix! Cinnamon Filling Instructions - - In a small bowl, combine all of the cinnamon filling ingredients and mix well.  - Place this bowl in the freezer for ~5-8 minutes until it‚Äôs very firm to the touch. Assembly & Baking - - Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F and line a baking sheet with parchment paper (I use two baking sheets for this recipe as the cookies will spread out while baking). - Once your filling is firm, spread half of the cookie dough out onto the bottom of the mixing bowl (I like to push the remaining cookie dough to the side of the bowl as opposed to taking it out and dirtying up another bowl).  - Using a 1/2 or 1 tsp, scoop the firm cinnamon roll filling out and place it all around the top of the spread out cookie dough. Once you have half of the cinnamon filling spread over the first half of the dough in pieces, spread the remaining dough overtop and press it down gently to really set the filling into place.  - Lastly, scoop the remaining cinnamon filling on top of the dough. Make sure you spread out the cinnamon filling pieces to ensure that you have an even distribution of cinnamon throughout each cookie once they are baked.  - Using a cookie dough scoop, evenly scoop out 10-12 cookie dough balls. Roll them into neat circles, place them a few inches apart from one another on your baking sheet, and bake for 8-10 minutes or until they are just slightly golden on the edge. The baking time will vary depending on your oven so be sure to keep an eye on them! - Allow to cool before serving and enjoy! **OPTIONAL: If you would like slightly thicker cookies, you can cover the cookie dough balls  and refrigerate them overnight. This will ensure that they don‚Äôt spread out too much if you‚Äôre worried about that and if you want them to be slightly thicker than mine!  #cinnamonrolls #bakingvideos #foodtutorials #recipeideas #dessert #baking #cookiedough

steps: In a medium bowl, cream together the room temperature butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Add the egg and vanilla extract, mixing until well combined.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the dry ingredients: all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon, baking powder, fine salt, and baking soda.
Slowly add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture and mix until just combined, avoiding over-mixing.
In a small bowl, combine the cinnamon filling ingredients: softened butter, packed brown sugar, all-purpose flour, and ground cinnamon, and mix well.
Place the cinnamon filling mixture in the freezer for about 5-8 minutes until firm.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Spread half of the cookie dough in the bottom of a bowl or baking sheet.
Scoop the firm cinnamon filling out and place it in small portions over the cookie dough.
Spread the remaining cookie dough over the cinnamon filling and press down gently to set the filling in place.
Scoop the remaining cinnamon filling on top of the dough and spread out evenly.
Using a cookie dough scoop, form 10-12 balls of the cookie dough and place them on the baking sheet a few inches apart.
Bake for 8-10 minutes or until slightly golden at the edges.
Allow to cool before serving.
extracted.title: Cinnamon Roll Sugar Cookies

ingredients.name: packed light or dark brown sugar

recipes.rawText: Apple fritter focaccia bread üçé full recipe down below üòâ For the focaccia bread - 500g bread flour  - 420ml warm water, no higher than 110F - 6g (1.5 teaspoons) instant yeast - 5g (1 teaspoon) honey, or sugar - 15ml (1 tbsp) olive oil - 10g (2 teaspoons) fine sea salt For the apple pie filling/topping: * 450g apples (about 3 apples), peel cored and small diced * 2 tbsp butter  * Juice of 1/2 lemon  * 60g brown sugar, packed  * 1/4 tsp salt * 1 1/2 tsp cinnamon * Cornstarch slurry: 1 1/2 tsp cornstarch plus 1 1/2 tsp water For the cinnamon butter filling/topping * 4 tablespoons of butter, melted * 1/3 cup (85g) of brown sugar * 1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon * 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg * 1/2 teaspoon of vanilla extract For the cinnamon glaze * 3/4 cup powder sugar * 2-3 tbsp milk or heavy cream * 1/2 tsp cinnamon * 1/2 tsp (2.5 ml) vanilla extract  After mixing your dough, cover and rest for 15 minutes. Then fold over your dough a couple times with wet hands. Rest for 15 minutes. Do this process two more times (total of 3 folding and resting sessions). Then bulk proof for 1 1/2 hours. Place the proofed dough in a buttered 9x13 inch baking pan. Add in HALF of the apple pie filling and HALF of the cinnamon sugar filling. Fold your dough like an envelope (shown in the video). Then proof for 1 1/2 hours. Then top with remaining apple pie filling and cinnamon sugar filling. Gently dimple the dough using your fingers. Bake at 425F for 25 minutes or until golden brown. Or until the internal temperature is at or higher than 190F.  #focaccia #bakingtiktok #bakingszn #fallbaking #focacciabread

steps: Mix dough ingredients: bread flour, warm water, instant yeast, honey, olive oil, and fine sea salt.
Cover and rest the dough for 15 minutes.
Fold the dough over a couple of times with wet hands, then rest for another 15 minutes.
Repeat the folding and resting process two more times (total of 3 folding and resting sessions).
Bulk proof the dough for 1 1/2 hours.
Place the proofed dough in a buttered 9x13 inch baking pan.
Add in half of the apple pie filling and half of the cinnamon sugar filling.
Fold the dough like an envelope as shown in the video.
Proof for another 1 1/2 hours.
Top with the remaining apple pie filling and cinnamon sugar filling.
Gently dimple the dough using your fingers.
Bake at 425F for 25 minutes or until golden brown and the internal temperature is at or above 190F.
extracted.title: Apple Fritter Focaccia Bread

recipes.rawText: Yogurt Marinated Chickenüçóüçã Say GOODBYE to dry @$$ chicken, and hello to juicy, tender chicken. Recipe below‚¨áÔ∏è üë©üèª‚Äçüç≥ Never miss a recipe! Sign up and join Sammy‚Äôs Cook Club and be the first to know about all things cooking, from exclusive recipes, to insider tips!  ‚Ä®‚û°Ô∏è Recipes always on sammymontgoms dot com (linked in my bi0) Marinade: * 1/2 cup plain full fat greek yogurt * 1/4 cup olive oil * 1 tbsp honey * 1 lemon juiced, about 1/4 cup * 1 tsp lemon zest * 5 garlic cloves minced * 1 tbsp fresh parsley chopped fine * 1/2 tsp seasoning salt * 1/4 tsp black pepper * 1/2 tsp paprika * 1/2 tsp onion powder * 1/2 tsp dried oregano * 1/2 tsp dried basil * 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper * 1/4 tsp coriander * 1/4 tsp cumin #chicken #chickenrecipes #chickendinner #yogurtmarinatedchicken #chickencutlets #easyrecipes #foodtiktok

steps: In a bowl, combine greek yogurt, olive oil, honey, lemon juice, lemon zest, minced garlic, and chopped parsley.
Add seasoning salt, black pepper, paprika, onion powder, oregano, basil, cayenne pepper, coriander, and cumin to the mixture and mix well.
Place chicken in a large ziplock bag or container and pour marinade over the chicken, ensuring all pieces are coated.
Seal the bag or cover the container and refrigerate for at least 1 hour (or overnight for best results).
Preheat grill or skillet over medium-high heat.
Remove chicken from marinade, allowing excess to drip off.
Cook chicken for about 6-7 minutes on each side, or until fully cooked and juices run clear.
Remove from heat and let rest for a few minutes before serving.

recipes.rawText: Iced oatmeal cinnamon cookies I‚Äôm not kidding when I tell you these might be my favorite cookie recipe to date!! They are so easy to make and are so addicting! Try it and tag me! d‚ÄôEATS -1/2 cup soft unsalted butter -1/2 cup brown sugar -1/4 cup granulated sugar -1 egg -1 tsp vanilla extract  -1 cup rolled oats -1 cup all purpose flour  -3/4 tsp baking soda -1 tsp cinnamon  -salt  Icing -1 cup powder sugar  -1 tbsp milk  How to: Start by preheating your oven to 350F. Using a cookie scoop, scoop onto a lined tray. This recipe makes 12-14 cookies.  Bake for 10 minutes and ice!  Enjoy!! #cookie #pumpkin #fyp #foryoupage #recipes                         ‚Å£

steps: Preheat the oven to 350¬∞F.
In a stand mixer or bowl, beat butter and sugars for 2 minutes.
Add in the egg and vanilla extract and beat for 30 seconds.
Add in dry ingredients and fold to combine.
