recipes.rawText: High Protein Cheesy Beef Potato Pockets! üî•üßÄü•©ü•î #mealprep #highprotein #cheesypotatopockets #hotpockets #highproteinmealprep #tastymealprep #easymealprep #lowcalorierecipes #gymfood #musclegain #fatloss #highproteinrecipes #panaceapalm #easyrecipes ONLY 296 calories, 24g Protein! Easy High Protein Meal Prep üòã Checkout my High Protein Cookbook with 180+ recipes and calorie tracking barcodes! (Link in bio) üìïüë®üèΩ‚Äçüç≥  Makes 8 Pockets üî• Calories & Macros üìä Per Pocket: 296 calories  24g P | 31g C | 8g F   Beef filling  - 500g lean ground beef (5% fat or less)  - 1 medium diced white onion  - 10g diced chilli (optional for heat - sub with 1/2 tsp cayenne) - 1 tsp garlic powder - 1 tsp smoked paprika - 1 tsp salt  - 1 tsp black pepper - 1 tsp mixed herbs - Cooking spray    Potato Pocket Dough - 900g peeled potatoes (chop and boil in salted water starting from cold for an even cook) - 125g (1 cup flour) - 1 egg - Salt to taste Mix to form a dough, it may be a little sticky, lightly grease your hands to help with handling Pocket assembly  - 1/8 potato pocket dough - 1/8 meat filling (weigh out total mixture and divide by 8 for gram amount) - 20g low fat grated cheese  Place in a pan with cooking spray on medium-low heat, cover with a lid and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side till golden brown üî• Storage & Heating ‚ô®Ô∏è - Once cooled wrap in foil and store in the fridge or freezer - To reheat from the fridge, unwrap from the foil and microwave for 1-2 minutes. toast in the pan for a couple minutes to get crispy again - to reheat from the freezer unwrap from the foil, wrap in a damp paper towel and microwave for 2-3 minutes. Then remove the towel and pan toast to get crispy, enjoy! Checkout my High Protein Cookbook with 180+ recipes and calorie tracking barcodes! (Link in bio) üìïüë®üèΩ‚Äçüç≥

extracted.notes: To reheat from the fridge, unwrap and microwave for 1-2 minutes, then toast in the pan. To reheat from the freezer, unwrap, wrap in a damp paper towel, microwave for 2-3 minutes, then pan toast.
steps: Chop and boil 900g peeled potatoes in salted water until tender.
Drain potatoes and mash them.
Add 1 cup flour, 1 egg, and salt to taste to the mashed potatoes; mix to form a dough (it may be sticky).

In a pan, cook 500g ground beef with 1 diced onion, 10g diced chilli (if using), 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp smoked paprika, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper, and 1 tsp mixed herbs until beef is browned and cooked through.
Allow the beef filling to cool slightly.
Divide the potato pocket dough into 8 equal portions.
Shape each portion into a flat circle, fill with 1/8 of the beef filling, and top with 20g grated cheese.
Fold the dough over the filling to create a pocket, sealing the edges carefully.
In a pan, spray cooking spray and cook each pocket on medium-low heat with a lid on for 1-2 minutes on each side until golden brown.
Once cooked, allow to cool before wrapping in foil for storage.

recipes.rawText: Step by step, take my hand. KA APPLE PIE COOKIES.  KICKASS Apple Pie Cookies Makes 10 cookies Macros per cookie: 11g protein, 2g fat, 29g carbs, 196 calories Ingredients 	‚Ä¢	3 large apples, diced small (I like Honeycrisp) 	‚Ä¢	3 scoops (1 cup) vanilla protein powder 	‚Ä¢	1 cup old-fashioned oats 	‚Ä¢	1 cup oat flour 	‚Ä¢	1/2 cup Greek yogurt 	‚Ä¢	2 tbsp honey 	‚Ä¢	3 tbsp maple syrup 	‚Ä¢	1 tsp cinnamon (be generous) 	‚Ä¢	Juice of 1/2 lemon (and zest) 	‚Ä¢	Pinch of salt 	‚Ä¢	Optional: 1/4 cup milk (any kind, only if dough feels dry) Instructions 	1.	Preheat oven to 350¬∞F and line a baking sheet with parchment paper. 	2.	Cook apples: Heat diced apples with maple syrup, cinnamon, lemon juice (and zest), and a pinch of salt in a pan for 6‚Äì8 minutes until soft. Cool in the freezer. 	3.	Make dough: Mix protein powder, oat flour, oats, Greek yogurt, and honey in a bowl. If the dough feels too dry, add the optional milk. 	4.	Combine: Fold in the cooled apples. Roll into 10 balls and place on the baking sheet. 	5.	Bake for 12 minutes. Notes: If the cookies turn out dry, it could be due to the protein powder or the size of the apples you used. Whatever the case, just add a little milk to bring the dough together. ‚∏ª Storage: Store in a container on the countertop or in the fridge ‚Äî just note that they can get pretty moist if left there too long. I like to keep them in the freezer and heat them up in the microwave for 10‚Äì15 seconds. #fyp

recipes.rawText: Elevating a college meal by turning ground beef into something a little tastier (ft. @Jellycat Mozzie) Japanese BBQ Beef Bowl Ingredients: 	‚Ä¢	1 lb ground beef 	‚Ä¢	1 tbsp dark soy sauce 	‚Ä¢	2 tbsp light soy sauce 	‚Ä¢	1 tbsp mirin 	‚Ä¢	2 cloves garlic, minced 	‚Ä¢	1 tsp grated ginger 	‚Ä¢	1 tbsp honey 	‚Ä¢	¬Ω tsp black pepper Optional Garnish & Sides: 	‚Ä¢	Sriracha mayo 	‚Ä¢	Sesame seeds 	‚Ä¢	Scallions 	‚Ä¢	Fresh rice Instructions: 	1. recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Nutella Sea Salt Fudge is an easy dessert my family loves!  INGREDIENTS  1 can sweetened condensed milk 1 tsp vanilla extract 1 cup bittersweet chocolate chips 1 cup of Nutella  3 TBSP of butter  Sea salt  INSTRUCTIONS  Add sweetened condensed milk, vanilla extract, chocolate chips, Nutella, and butter to a glass bowl. Mix together well.  Microwave for 15-20 seconds at a time until everything is melted, smooth, and seems to start thickening (I stir every 15-20 seconds so it doesn‚Äôt burn) I probably microwaved this for about 3 minutes total.  Line a 11 x 7 baking dish with parchment paper and spray with some cooking spray. Pour fudge into baking dish and sprinkle on some sea salt.  Let sit in the refrigerator for at least 2-3 hours to set up. Keep in the refrigerator when not eating the fudge! *I melt everything in the microwave, but you can also set up a double boiler on the stove and use a glass/stainless steel bowl if you prefer that method!  Enjoy! #nutellafudge #fudgerecipe #easyrecipes #dessert #christmasrecipes #christmastreats #recipe

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: ‚Äã‚ÄãCINNAMON ROLL PROTEIN OVERNIGHT OATS! 22g protein and tastes like a little holiday treat. Breakfast that tastes like dessert and hits your protein goals? YES, PLEASE! These oats are inspired by the cinnamon rolls I used to bake with my grandma‚Äîexcept now, I can enjoy that same cozy flavor every single day. They‚Äôll keep you full and fueled all morning long. Plus, they‚Äôre blended for the creamiest texture, and the Greek yogurt maple icing on top takes them over the edge! YOU‚ÄôLL NEED: -2 c old-fashioned oats -1 scoop vanilla protein powder -1 c unsweetened almond milk or milk of choice -1 c nonfat plain Greek yogurt -1 T chia seeds or ground flaxseeds -2 T pure maple syrup -1/2 tsp pure vanilla extract -1/2 tsp ground cinnamon -1/8 tsp kosher salt For the icing: -1 T Greek yogurt -1/2 tsp maple syrup -1 tsp milk of choice Blend everything except the icing ingredients and divide into jars. Refrigerate 2 hours or overnight. When ready to serve, stir together the icing ingredients and drizzle on top. DEVOUR! For detailed STEP BY STEPS or to print, search for the recipe at wellplated.com! #overnightoats #cinnamonrolls #highproteinbreakfast #mealprepbreakfast #healthybreakfast #wellplatedrecipes #dessertforbreakfast #highproten #blendedoats #littletreat

steps: In a blender, combine the old-fashioned oats, vanilla protein powder, unsweetened almond milk, nonfat plain Greek yogurt, chia seeds, pure maple syrup, pure vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, and kosher salt.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Divide the blended mixture into jars or containers.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight to allow the oats to soak up the liquid and soften.
When ready to serve, mix together the Greek yogurt, maple syrup, and milk to create the icing.
Drizzle the icing on top of the overnight oats before serving.

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Crockpot Buffalo Chicken Pasta is an easy and delicious dinner recipe!  INGREDIENTS  1 lb chicken breast 1 chopped onion  1 tbsp of ranch seasoning  1/2 tsp each of salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, and Italian seasoning  1 jar of Alfredo sauce  1/4 - 1/2 of a cup of Buffalo Wild Wings Medium Sauce (start with 1/4 if you don‚Äôt like it spicy)  16 oz box of pasta 1/4 cup of Parmesan cheese  1/2 - 1 cup of shredded mozzarella 2 tbsp of bottled ranch dressing    INSTRUCTIONS  Add the chicken, chopped onion, dry ranch seasoning, salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, Italian seasoning and about 1/4 cup of buffalo sauce to a crockpot. Cook on low for 4-6 hours.  Shred or chop up the chicken and add it back to the crockpot. Add one jar of Alfredo sauce, Parmesan cheese, Mozzarella cheese, and ranch dressing to the crockpot and stir well.  Boil a box of pasta according to the directions on the package.  Add the cooked pasta to the crockpot and mix everything together. Top with Parmesan cheese and dried parsley. Taste and add more buffalo sauce if needed. Serve and enjoy!  #easyrecipes #dinner #mealideas #buffalowildwings #crockpotrecipe #buffalochicken #pasta

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Crockpot Beef Stew  INGREDIENTS  3 lb chuck roast, cut into cubes  Salt, pepper, garlic powder  1/2 cup flour  2 tbsp butter 1 cup red wine  1 1/2 cups celery, chopped  2 cups carrots, chopped  1 onion, chopped  2 lb Yukon gold potatoes, chopped into large pieces  1/2 tsp salt 1 tsp each pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika  1 tbsp minced garlic  6 oz tomato paste  2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce  3 cups beef broth  2 bay leaves  1 1/2 cups frozen peas  INSTRUCTIONS  Start making this recipe, by prepping all of the veggies. Chop an onion. Chop about 1 1/2 cups of celery. Chop about 2 heaping cups of carrots (be sure to keep these in larger bite size pieces). Scrub 2 lbs of Yukon gold potatoes and chop them into larger bite size pieces. Set all the vegetables aside.  Cut a roast into large cubes and season with some salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Add 1/2 cup of flour to a large container and toss the meat in the flour.  Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add two tbsp of butter. Once the butter has melted add half of the meat and cook just until browned on all sides. Remove the meat from the skillet and add two more tbsp of butter. Brown the rest of the meat. Remove the meat from the skillet and add 1 cup red wine. Scrape all the browned bits from the skillet and turn the heat off.  Spray a large crockpot with cooking spray and add the meat to the crockpot. Pour the red wine over the meat. Add the chopped celery, carrots, and onion. Add the potatoes and season with salt, pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, and paprika.  Next, add one tbsp of minced garlic, 6 oz of tomato paste, 2 tbsp of Worcestershire sauce, and 3 cups of beef broth. Stir as best as you can while still keeping the meat submerged in the liquid. Top with a couple of bay leaves.  Cook on low for 8-10 hours. If you are using stew meat I‚Äôd definitely shoot for 9-10 hours because it can take longer for stew meat to get tender.  Once the meat is tender, add 1 1/2 cups of frozen peas and let them cook in the crockpot for about 15-20 minutes. Serve in bowls with some bread and enjoy!  #recipe #beefstew #crockpot #dinner #mealideas #roast

steps: Chop the onion, celery, carrots, and Yukon gold potatoes into large bite-sized pieces.
Cut the chuck roast into large cubes and season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
In a large container, toss the seasoned meat with 1/2 cup of flour.
Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and melt 2 tbsp of butter.
Add half of the floured meat to the skillet and brown on all sides, then remove it from the skillet.
Repeat with the remaining meat and butter.
Add 1 cup of red wine to the skillet, scraping the browned bits from the bottom, then turn off the heat.
Spray a crockpot with cooking spray and add the browned meat.
Pour the red wine mixture over the meat and add the chopped celery, carrots, onion, and potatoes.
Season with 1/2 tsp salt, 1 tsp pepper, 1 tsp onion powder, 1 tsp garlic powder, and 1 tsp paprika.
Stir in 1 tbsp minced garlic, 6 oz tomato paste, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, and 3 cups beef broth while keeping the meat submerged.
Add 2 bay leaves on top.
Cook on low for 8-10 hours, aiming for 9-10 hours for tenderness if using stew meat.
Once the meat is tender, add 1 1/2 cups of frozen peas and let cook for an additional 15-20 minutes.
Serve in bowls with some bread and enjoy!
extracted.title: Crockpot Beef Stew

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Crockpot French Dip Sandwiches are one my favorites for a cold day! INGREDIENTS  3-4 lb Chuck Roast Salt, pepper, and garlic powder  2 TBSP butter  1 onion sliced  2 TBSP minced garlic 2 TBSP of Worcestershire sauce  12 oz of beer  1 package of Au Jus  1 1/2 cups beef broth  Sub rolls Provolone cheese  INSTRUCTIONS Season the chuck roast on all sides with salt, pepper, and garlic. Spray the egg rolls with cooking spray and place them in the air fryer basket.
Air fry the egg rolls at 375¬∞F for 10-13 minutes or until golden and crispy.

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Slow Cooker Creamy Tuscan Chicken with Garlic Cubed Potatoes. üôè You‚Äôll need: üîπ For the chicken: - 600 g chicken breast   - 1 onion   - 3 cloves garlic   - 5‚Äì6 sun-dried tomatoes   - 10 mL sun-dried tomato oil   - 100 mL chicken stock   - 1 tsp oregano   - 1 tsp salt   - 1 tsp chilli flakes   - 80 mL double cream   - 60 g Parmesan cheese   - 2 handfuls of spinach   üîπ For the potatoes: - 600 g potatoes   - 20 g light butter   - Garlic salt   - 1 garlic clove   - 1 tsp oregano   Instructions: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Chicken: Start by seasoning the chicken with 1 tsp cornflour, 1 tsp salt, and a drizzle of olive oil (optional but enhances the flavour). Chocolate Chip Black Bean Muffins Ingredients 2 (15.5 oz) cans Black Beans, drained and rinsed, or 2¬º cup Cooked Black Beans 4 Eggs ¬Ω cup Maple Syrup, or Honey (use ¬º cup for less sugar) ¬Ω cup Cocoa Powder 1 Tbsp Neutral Oil  1 tsp Vanilla Extract 1 tsp Baking Powder ¬º tsp Salt ‚Öì cup Semi-sweet Chocolate Chips, sugar free or any kind you love, optional Instructions 1. recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: BROWN BUTTER CHOCOLATE CHIP CRUMB LOAF CAKE So in love with everything about this ü•π Recipe below OR go to my website through the link in my bio ü§é #Recipe Details (8-10 servings): Chocolate Chip Cinnamon Crumb Topping: - 3/4 cup (90g) all-purpose flour @Bob‚Äôs Red Mill  - 1 tsp (4g) cinnamon - 3 1/2 tbsp (52g) granulated sugar - 3 1/2 tbsp (56g) brown sugar  - 6 tbsp (85g) salted butter, melted - 1/2 cup (100g) chocolate chips of choice (I used a mixture of semi-sweet + mini chocolate chips) @Nestl√© @Nestle Toll House @Nestl√© USA  Brown Butter Chocolate Chip Loaf Cake: - 1 3/4 cup (225g) all-purpose flour - 1 1/2 tsp (7g) baking powder  - 1/2 tsp (3g) salt - 1/2 cup (113g) salted butter - 3/4 cup (160g) granulated sugar  - 2 eggs, at room temperature  - 1/2 cup (120g) greek yogurt, at room temperature (sub: sour cream) @FAGE  - 1/2 cup (120ml) milk of choice, at room temperature - 2 tsp (8g) vanilla extract - 1 cup (200g) chocolate chips of choice (I used 1/2 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips + 1/2 cup mini chocolate chips) Instructions: Preheat the oven to 350F. Grease and line a standard (9x5‚Äù) loaf pan with parchment paper; set aside. Start by browning the butter for the cake. Add the 1/2 cup butter to a saucepan over medium-high heat. Allow to melt and slightly brown (~5 minutes). Remove from the heat and immediately pour into a large bowl. Set aside to cool slightly. While the brown butter is cooling, prepare the crumb topping. In a medium bowl, combine the flour, cinnamon, both sugars, and butter. Mix until it resembles wet sand. Then, mix in the chocolate chips. Place into the refrigerator to chill while you make the rest of the loaf cake. Continue preparing the cake batter. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside. Once the brown butter has slightly cooled, add the sugar. Whisk until well combined.  Add in the eggs, and whisk until fully incorporated. Then, add in the greek yogurt, milk, and vanilla. Whisk until well combined.  Add the dry ingredient mixture to the wet. Use a wooden spoon or spatula to mix until just combined and there are no large clumps of flour, being careful not to over-mix. You can also take a whisk and gently whisk to remove any large clumps of flour! Gently fold in the chocolate chips. Pour or scoop the batter into the prepared loaf pan and spread to even the top. Then, sprinkle the chocolate chip cinnamon crumb topping all over the top. Bake at 350F for 60-70 minutes, until golden and a toothpick inserted into the middle comes out clean. Check the loaf at ~50 minutes; if the top is getting too brown, tent the top with foil. Remove from the oven and let cool in the pan for at least 10-15 minutes. Then remove and transfer to a serving plate or wire cooling rack. ‚Ä®Slice and serve warm with butter and flaky sea salt, if desired. Enjoy! #brownbutter #chocolate #chocolatechip #loaf #loafcake #cakerecipe #loafcakerecipe #brownbutterchocolatechipcake #brownbutterchocolatechiploaf #chocolatechiploafcake #chocolatechipcake #brownbutterchocolatechiploafcake #chocolatechiploaf #Breakfast #brunch #snack #Dessert #baking @From Our Place @Earlywood

extracted.notes: Serve with butter and flaky sea salt if desired.
steps: Preheat the oven to 350¬∞F (180¬∞C).
Grease and line a standard (9x5) loaf pan with parchment paper; set aside.
Add 1/2 cup of butter to a saucepan over medium-high heat and allow to melt and brown for about 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and pour into a large bowl to cool slightly.

In a medium bowl, combine 3/4 cup flour, cinnamon, both sugars, and melted butter for the crumb topping. Mix until it resembles wet sand, then stir in chocolate chips. Place the mixture in the refrigerator to chill.
In a separate medium bowl, whisk together 1 3/4 cup flour, baking powder, and salt for the cake batter.
Once the brown butter has cooled, whisk in granulated sugar until well combined, then add the eggs and whisk until fully incorporated.
Mix in the greek yogurt, milk, and vanilla until well combined.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined. Avoid over-mixing. Gently fold in the chocolate chips.
Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and spread to even the top. Sprinkle the crumb topping over the batter.
Bake at 350¬∞F for 60-70 minutes, or until golden and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. Check at around 50 minutes; if the top is browning too much, tent it with foil.
Remove from oven and let cool in the pan for at least 10-15 minutes before transferring to a wire cooling rack. Slice and serve warm.
extracted.title: Brown Butter Chocolate Chip Crumb Loaf Cake

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Slow Cooker Mongolian Beef Stew, follow for more  This Mongolian Beef Stew is up there in my top three slow cooker recipes I‚Äôve ever made, the beef literally melts in your mouth, its a must try trust me. It serves 5 and comes in at 351 calories 30.4g protein per serving, lets go:  Ingredients: Serves 5 (351 calories 30.4g protein per serving) 125ml soy sauce  125ml beef stock  120ml water  1 carrot thinly sliced  2 small onion thinly sliced  50g brown sugar  1 red bell pepper sliced  1 yellow bell pepper sliced  1 tbsp garlic minced  1 tbsp ginger minced  1 tbsp sriracha sauce  1 tbsp tomato puree  700g stewing beef (sustainably sourced where possible)  2 tbsp cornflour  1 tbsp olive oil  1 tbsp sliced spring onions (garnish) Half red chilli sliced (garnish)  Method:  - On a medium heat add 1 tbsp olive oil to pan and add your beef, sieve over 2 tbsp cornflour and brown off for 5-7 mins then set aside.  - Add the rest of the ingredients to the slow cooker pot along with your seared off beef, season well then cook on high for 4 hours or low 6-8 hours. Serve with creamy mash or rice and tuck in, enjoy.  Follow @archerkitchen for more delicious slow cooker recipes.  #slowcookerrecipes #archerkitchen #mongolianbeef #mongolianbeefstew #healthyrecipes #autumnrecipes

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: ‚á© Full Recipe üçó ‚á© Macros per serving (1 meal prep): Protein: 42g Carbs: 79g Fat: 22g Calories: 689 Ingredients per 2 servings (makes 2 meal preps): Chicken: - 12oz boneless, skinless chicken thigh, raw - 3 tbsp soy sauce - 3 tbsp hoisin sauce - 1.5 tbsp honey - 2 tsp minced garlic - 1 tbsp clear rice wine - 1 tsp sesame oil - 1/2 tsp five spice powder - 3 tbsp water - salt & pepper, to taste Rice: - 1.5 cups cooked rice Salad: - 2.5 cups sliced Persian cucumber - 1/4 tsp¬†salt - 1/4 tsp¬†ginger - 1/4 tsp¬†minced garlic - 2 tbsp¬†rice vinegar - 1/2 tbsp soy sauce - 1/2 tbsp¬†sesame oil - 1/2 tbsp¬†honey - 2 tsp¬†chili oil - 1 tbsp sesame seed How to make it yourself: 1. Dice your cucumbers and pat dry 2. In a bowl, combine soy sauce, hoisin sauce, honey, minced garlic, rice wine, sesame oil, five spice powder, water, and salt and pepper to taste. 3. Add your chicken thighs into the bowl, poke holes in the chicken using a fork, and mix well.  4. In a bowl, combine your diced cucumbers with salt, ginger, minced garlic, rice vinegar, soy sauce, sesame oil, honey, chili oil, and sesame seeds and mix well. 5. Place your marinated chicken on parchment baking paper and place it into an airfrier. Add the remaining sauce on top. Cook in your airfrier at 380 degrees fahrenheit for around 19 minutes, flipping it halfway in between, or until golden brown. 6. Remove the cooked chicken and cut it into slices 7. In a meal prep container, add your steamed rice, chicken, and cucumber salad and enjoy! 8. Pro tip: when meal prepping to re-heat, make sure to put your salad & meat into separate ziploc bags to avoid getting the rice soggy. When ready to eat, microwave the rice with a wet paper towel first to get it steamed, then add in your meat and microwave till warm, and finally add in your veggies on top preserve the crunch and enjoy! üì©¬†Save this Char Siu Chicken recipe to make for later and if you make it, post it and tag me in it! recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Yogurt Marinated Chickenüçóüçã Say GOODBYE to dry @$$ chicken, and hello to juicy, tender chicken. Recipe below‚¨áÔ∏è üë©üèª‚Äçüç≥ Never miss a recipe! Sign up and join Sammy‚Äôs Cook Club and be the first to know about all things cooking, from exclusive recipes, to insider tips!  ‚Ä®‚û°Ô∏è Recipes always on sammymontgoms dot com (linked in my bi0) Marinade: * 1/2 cup plain full fat greek yogurt * 1/4 cup olive oil * 1 tbsp honey * 1 lemon juiced, about 1/4 cup * 1 tsp lemon zest * 5 garlic cloves minced * 1 tbsp fresh parsley chopped fine * 1/2 tsp seasoning salt * 1/4 tsp black pepper * 1/2 tsp paprika * 1/2 tsp onion powder * 1/2 tsp dried oregano * 1/2 tsp dried basil * 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper * 1/4 tsp coriander * 1/4 tsp cumin #chicken #chickenrecipes #chickendinner #yogurtmarinatedchicken #chickencutlets #easyrecipes #foodtiktok

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together Greek yogurt, olive oil, honey, lemon juice, lemon zest, minced garlic, chopped parsley, seasoning salt, black pepper, paprika, onion powder, oregano, basil, cayenne pepper, coriander, and cumin until fully combined.
Place the chicken cutlets in the marinade, ensuring they are well coated. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight for maximum flavor.
Preheat the grill or oven for cooking.
Remove chicken from the marinade and discard the marinade.
Grill or bake the chicken at 375¬∞F (190¬∞C) for about 30 minutes, or until fully cooked and internal temperature reaches 165¬∞F (74¬∞C).

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Marry Me Chicken Pasta Ingredients * 4 skin on chicken thighs * Salt and pepper to taste * 2 tbsp olive oil * 2 tbsp unsalted butter * 1 small onion(minced) * 4 cloves garlic(minced) * 3 tbsp tomato paste * 2 tbsp gochujang * 1/4 cup white wine * 1 cup chicken stock * 1+1/4 cup heavy cream * 1/3 cup sun-dried tomatoes with oil(chopped) * 1 tbsp gochugaru * 1 tsp oregano * Zest of 1 lemon+1 tbsptbsp lemon juice * 5 basil leaves(thinly sliced) * 3/4 lbs pasta * 1/4 cup pasta water *  1/2 cup parmesano reggiano(grated) Instructions 1. Season chicken thighs with salt and pepper on both sides. Add the chicken to a cold pan and turn the heat to medium high. Once the chicken skin is golden brown(10-15 minutes), flip it over to cook for a minute on the other side. 2. Remove the chicken and in the same pan add olive oil and butter to saute onions and garlic for a few minutes until translucent. 3. Add tomato paste and gochujang and cook for a few minutes until it turns a deep red color. 4. Deglaze with white wine and once the alcohol has mostly evaporated, go in with chicken stock. 5. Bring to a simmer before adding in heavy cream then add sun-dried tomatoes, gochugaru, oregano, lemon zest and juice, and basil. 6. Once the sauce has thickened, season with salt and pepper and add back the chicken thighs skin side up with the heat turned to low. 7. While thats simmering, boil your favorite pasta in salted boiling water until al dente. 8. Remove the chicken thighs and add the pasta pouring in pasta water as necessary. 9. Grate in parmesan and once the sauce starts to cling to the pasta, plate it up and enjoy. #tablefortwo #tablefor2 #marrymechicken #chickenrecipes #chickenrecipe #marrymechickenpasta #pasta #pastarecipe #pastarecipes #easyrecipe #easyrecipes #datenight #datenighrecipe #datenighrecipes #recipe #cooking #food #recipevideo #cookingvideo #foodvideo #easyrecipe #easyrecipes #recipetutorial #cookingtutorial #foodtutorial

steps: Season chicken thighs with salt and pepper on both sides.
In a cold pan, add chicken thighs and turn the heat to medium-high. Cook until skin is golden brown (10-15 minutes), then flip to cook for 1 minute on the other side.
Remove chicken from the pan. In the same pan, add olive oil and butter to saut√© onions and garlic for a few minutes until translucent.
Stir in tomato paste and gochujang, cooking for a few minutes until it takes on a deep red color.
Deglaze the pan with white wine, allowing the alcohol to evaporate before adding chicken stock.
Bring the mixture to a simmer, then stir in heavy cream, sun-dried tomatoes, gochugaru, oregano, lemon zest, lemon juice, and basil.
Once the sauce has thickened, season with salt and pepper, and add the chicken thighs back skin side up, reducing heat to low.
Meanwhile, boil your favorite pasta in salted boiling water until al dente.
After cooking, remove the chicken thighs and mix the pasta with the sauce, adding pasta water as necessary.
Grate in parmesan and mix until the sauce clings to the pasta. Plate and enjoy.
extracted.title: Marry Me Chicken Pasta

recipes.rawText: VIDEO TITLE: Weeknight Skillet Fish Tacos ‚Äì No Frying, No Fuss Fish tacos in 20 minutes‚Äîflaky, skillet-seared fish, a crisp cabbage slaw, and a creamy sriracha kick. Warning: your kids might inhale these. ‚ú® You Need: Fish: 1 lb white fish (cod, tilapia, etc.) 1 tbsp taco seasoning 1 tbsp olive oil Slaw: 2 cups shredded cabbage ¬Ω small red onion, sliced ¬º cup chopped cilantro 1 tbsp olive oil Juice of 1 lime Pinch of salt Sauce: ¬º cup sour cream ¬º cup mayo 1 tbsp sriracha ¬Ω tbsp lime juice 2 garlic cloves, minced For Serving: Flour tortillas üî• How to Make: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Cook the Fish: Pat fish dry, coat with taco seasoning. Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Sear fish for 2‚Äì3 minutes per side until golden and flaky. Transfer to a plate and break into chunks. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Warm the Tortillas: Right after cooking the fish, add tortillas to the same skillet. Cook for about 30 seconds per side until lightly charred and slightly puffed. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Make the Slaw: Toss cabbage, red onion, and cilantro with lime juice, olive oil, and salt. 4Ô∏è‚É£ Mix the Sauce: Stir together sour cream, mayo, sriracha, lime juice, and minced garlic until smooth. #fishtacos #healthydinner #weeknightdinner #familydinner #cookingforkids

steps: Pat fish dry and coat with taco seasoning.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear the fish for 2-3 minutes per side until golden and flaky.
Transfer fish to a plate and break into chunks.
In the same skillet, add tortillas and cook for about 30 seconds per side until lightly charred and slightly puffed.
In a bowl, toss together shredded cabbage, sliced red onion, chopped cilantro, lime juice, olive oil, and a pinch of salt.
In another bowl, stir together sour cream, mayonnaise, sriracha, lime juice, and minced garlic until smooth.

recipes.rawText:
VIDEO TITLE: Meatloaf!!  This was delicious!! Who would have guessed that the milk in meatloaf is the real star of the show. Moist, juicy and flavourful, this one is definitely a crowd pleaser that I‚Äôll be making again. Try it for yourself and let me know what you think!  Recipe; Ingredients 2 lbs Ground beef 1 tablespoon Ontario butter 1 large white Onion diced  3 cloves Garlic minced  1 cup Ontario Milk 1 cup Breadcrumbs  1 tablespoon All-purpose seasoning 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce ¬º cup Ketchup  2 teaspoons Chili flakes 2 eggs  1 tablespoon Salt  2 teaspoons black Pepper Glaze ¬Ω cup Brown sugar ¬æ cup Ketchup 1 tablespoon Onion powder 1 tablespoon Garlic powder ¬º cup White vinegar  Using a whisk mix all ingredients together until fully combined and smooth.  Method; In a medium sized saut√© pan add one tablespoon of butter and sweat your onions and garlic until fully cooked. Approximately 3 minutes. Set aside and allow to cool to room temperature. In a small bowl combine breadcrumbs and milk and mix together.  In a large bowl add your ground beef, eggs, breadcrumb milk mixture, cooked garlic and onions as well as all other ingredients listed. Mix well until fully combined. In a 8x4 loaf pan, add your meat evenly and make sure it‚Äôs packed down.  Place loaf pan on a oven tray and bake the meatloaf on the middle rack in a preheated oven of 350f for 45 minutes Once initial bake is done, pour glaze over meatloaf and continue to cook for another 15-20 minutes.  Remove from oven and allow to cool for 10 minutes before slicing and serving.  #inspiredbydairy #easyrecipes @Ontario Dairy 

VIDEO CONTENT: This is my take on a classic meatloaf. I'm serving it with creamy mashed potatoes and green beans, and I'm telling you this one was a game-changer. Now let's get into it. First, we go ahead and chop and cook our onions and garlic. Next we mix our breadcrumbs with the Ontario milk. Do not skip this step guys. It's crucial. It's actually what makes the meatloaf juicy. Then we season the meat, add the onions and garlic, as well as the breadcrumbs back in, and we give it a good mix. Add the meat to a loaf pan and then bake it in the oven at 350 for 45 minutes. While that's in the oven, we get our potatoes on for mashed, and we trim and blanch our green beans. I toss the green beans in melted Ontario butter, as well as salt and pepper. For the glaze, it's brown sugar, ketchup, onion powder, garlic powder, and vinegar. Pour that all over your meatloaf and allow it to cook for another 15 minutes. Next, we rice our potatoes and add more cream and butter. Thanks guys.

steps: Meatloaf: Preheat the oven to 350¬∞F (175¬∞C).
Meatloaf: In a medium-sized saut√© pan, add 1 tablespoon of butter and sweat the diced onions and minced garlic until fully cooked, approximately 3 minutes. Set aside to cool.
Meatloaf: In a small bowl, combine the breadcrumbs and milk and mix together. Allow it to soak.
Meatloaf: In a large bowl, add the ground beef, eggs, breadcrumb mixture, cooled garlic and onions, and all other ingredients. Mix well until combined.
Meatloaf: Transfer the meat mixture into an 8x4 loaf pan and pack it down evenly.
Meatloaf: Place the loaf pan on an oven tray and bake for 45 minutes.
Meatloaf: After the initial bake, pour the glaze on top and continue cooking for another 15-20 minutes.
Meatloaf: Remove from the oven and allow to cool for 10 minutes before slicing and serving.
Glaze: Using a whisk, mix all the glaze ingredients together until fully combined and smooth.

recipes.rawText:
VIDEO TITLE: Grilled Cheese Breakfast Burritos (Makes 10 Burritos)  Macros Per Burrito: - 450 Calories - 65g Protein  - 29g Carbs - 13g Fat Ingredients:  - 40oz Lean Ground Beef (96/4) (1135g) - 1 Taco Seasoning Packet (1oz) (28g) - 0.25 Cup Red Enchilada Sauce (60g) - 2 Tbsps Minced Garlic (20g) - 0.5 Cup Diced White Onion (100g) - 12 Eggs (720g) - 1 Cup Blended Cottage Cheese (225g) - 6.5 Cups Fat Free Cheddar Cheese (730g) - Fresh Chives (10g) - 1 Tbsp Garlic Salt (15g) - 10 Low Calorie Tortillas  Sriracha Mayo: - 8 Tbsps Light Mayo (120g) - 4 Tbsps Sriracha (60g) - 0.25 Cup Lemon Juice (60g) - 0.5 Tbsp Garlic Salt (7g) Additional Notes: - Add about 0.5 Cup of cheese onto the pan per burrito when making the crispy cheese shell.  - To reheat the burritos from frozen, follow these steps. Microwave (uncovered) for around 5-6 minutes, and if you like it crispy, toast it on a pan for a few minutes on each side

VIDEO CONTENT: If you love Taco Bell but want to lose fat and build muscle, I have the perfect recipe for you. Because it's 65 grams of protein, these grilled cheese breakfast burritos will not only taste amazing, but keep you full for hours. And as always, these make amazing meal prep that you can just store in the freezer for later. Let's get into it. Start by adding diced white onion to a pan and cooking it until it gets a little color. Then add in lean ground beef, one taco seasoning packet, and chop it all up. And when the meat is almost done cooking, add in red enchilada sauce, fat free cheddar, minced garlic. Give it one more mix to melt the cheese and the meat should look just like this. Now whisk together some eggs and blended cottage cheese, then cook them slowly while constantly stirring. And when they're almost done, mix in some cheese, fresh chives, and garlic salt until they look just like this. Now assemble the burritos with egg, cooked beef, and some sriracha mayo. I'll put the recipe in the description. And finally, melt some cheese in a pan, place the burrito seam side down on it, let it crisp up, and roll it over. Wrap the burritos in aluminum foil and enjoy.

steps: Beef Filling: In a pan, add diced white onion and cook until it gets a little color.
Beef Filling: Add lean ground beef and taco seasoning, chopping until cooked.
Beef Filling: When the meat is almost done, stir in red enchilada sauce, fat free cheddar, and minced garlic until cheese melts and mixture looks cohesive.
Egg Mixture: In a bowl, whisk together eggs and blended cottage cheese.
Egg Mixture: Cook the mixture slowly in a pan, constantly stirring.
Egg Mixture: When almost set, mix in additional cheddar cheese, fresh chives, and garlic salt until fully cooked.
Sriracha Mayo: In a small bowl, mix together light mayo, sriracha, lemon juice, and garlic salt until smooth.
Burritos Assembly: Lay a tortilla flat and fill with egg mixture, beef filling, and a drizzle of sriracha mayo.
Burritos Assembly: Wrap the tortilla tightly into a burrito.
Burritos Assembly: Melt cheddar cheese on a pan; place burrito seam-side down onto melted cheese to crisp up, rolling to coat other side.
Burritos Assembly: Wrap finished burritos in aluminum foil for later use.

VIDEO CONTENT: You're telling me for 40 years, I could have been using ice cream for what? Ain't no way. Alright, so listen. I was at the lawnmower store last year and one of the guys that works there recognized me and we were talking and he said, you should make ice cream bread. And I said, make what? Are you kidding me? Let's do it. Alright, now he said to make strawberry ice cream bread, so I got some strawberry ice cream and I also got some salted brown butter cookie. So first off, I'm gonna throw these in the microwave, get them, you know, softened up real good before we mix it up with the self-rising flour. We need two cups of ice cream. That's some good ice cream. I'm gonna melt this down a little bit more so it's easy to mix with the flour. And we need one and a half cups of self-rising flour. Alright, flour in and now we mix it. Alright, you need an 8 by 4 bread tin, greased. Alright, now put your ice cream mixture in there. Try to level it out a little bit. Alright, we set that off to the side. Let's go ahead and make the salted brown butter cookie bread. Two cups of this ice cream. This is good. Oh yeah. Oh man, that is fire. Alright, one and a half cups of flour. Let's mix this up. Alright, grease our pan. Ice cream in. Alright, now both of these in the oven, 350 degrees for 30 to 40 minutes. One in the top, one in the bottom. We'll be back. While it's cooking, let's clean up. Our mess. I don't know how I do it or how my wife puts up with me. Alright, we just pulled them out of the oven. Perfect. They look and smell amazing. Oh yeah, look at that. This is the strawberry and this is the salted brown butter cookie. Let's put some in our mouth, what do you think? Cut us a piece and we got some Kerrygold butter. Oh yeah, look at that. I'm so excited. Alright, we're going to start with the strawberry ice cream bread. This is what the lawnmower man recommended. So let's go. Oh yeah. Oh my goodness. Ice cream bread, strawberry. That is so easy. And my goodness, that is so good. Wow. And now for the salted brown butter cookie. I can't believe it. Oh my, I don't know which one I like better. They're both amazing. I'm going to open up an ice cream shop, bread store. We're going to have it all. Make this. Use whatever type of ice cream you want. What's your favorite flavor? Let me know. See y'all.

recipes.rawText:
VIDEO TITLE: BROWN BUTTER BLUEBERRY MUFFIN COOKIE SKILLET Could you ask for anything more üò≠ Recipe below OR go to my website through the link in my bio ü§é #Recipe Details (serves 12-15): Brown Butter Blueberry Muffin Cookie Dough: - 1 cup (226g) salted butter - 3/4 cup (195g) brown sugar - 3/4 cup (165g) granulated sugar - 2 eggs, at room temperature - 2 tbsp (30ml) heavy cream, at room temperature - 1 tbsp (12g) vanilla extract - 3 1/2 cups (450g) all-purpose flour @Bob‚Äôs Red Mill  - 1 tsp (6g) salt - 1 1/2 tsp (6g) baking powder - 1/2 tsp (3g) baking soda - 1 3/4 cups (290g) fresh blueberries @Driscoll‚Äôs  - 1/2 cup (165g) blueberry preserves or jam @Bonne Maman US  Streusel Topping: - 6 tbsp (85g) salted butter, at room temperature  - 1/4 cup (65g) brown sugar - 3 tbsp (35g) granulated sugar  - 2/3 cup (85g) all-purpose flour - 1 tsp (3g) cinnamon - 1/2 tsp (3g) salt Instructions: Preheat the oven to 350F. Generously grease a 10‚Äù cast iron skillet with butter; set aside. Brown the butter. Add the butter to a saucepan over medium-high heat. Allow to melt and slightly brown (~5-8 minutes). Remove from the heat and immediately pour into a large bowl. Set aside and allow to cool slightly. While cooling, prepare the streusel topping. In a medium bowl, combine all of the ingredients and use your hands or a fork to mix until the mixture is crumbly and resembles wet send. Set aside. In a separate medium bowl, whisk together the flour, salt, baking powder, and baking soda. Once the brown butter is slightly cooled, add both sugars and whisk until combined.  Whisk in the eggs fully combined and lighter in color. Then whisk in the heavy cream and vanilla until combined.  Add the dry ingredients to the wet. Use a wooden spoon or spatula to mix until just combined. Then, GENTLY fold in the blueberries. Add dollops of the blueberry preserves all over the dough in the bowl, and GENTLY fold the dough a few times to disperse the preserves.  Transfer and press the batter into the prepared skillet, making sure it is in an even layer. Then sprinkle the streusel all over the top. Bake at 350F for 35-40 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center has puffed yet is still slightly gooey in the middle. Remove and allow to cool for at least 10 minutes before serving. Serve the cookie skillet warm with a dusting of powdered sugar and a scoop of vanilla ice cream, if desired. Enjoy! #brownbutter #blueberry #muffin #muffins #cookieskillet #brownbutterblueberrymuffincookieskillet #blueberrymuffins #blueberrymuffin #blueberrymuffincookies #blueberrycookies #brownbutterblueberrycookies #brownbuttercookies #cookierecipe #cookieskillet #cookieskilletrecipe #baking #Dessert #vanillaicecream #streusel @From Our Place @Earlywood 

VIDEO CONTENT: i think i'm truly in love with this. this is my brown butter blueberry muffin cookie skillet. it is exactly what you think it is. the center is soft and gooey while the edges are like perfectly golden and chewy and crispy. the streusel on top of this is so buttery and adds the perfect crunch. and then you get those juicy and tart blueberries and those big beautiful ribbons of blueberry preserves. every bite is like pure bliss. we're going to add in dollops of wild blueberry preserves and gently fold it in. you want

VIDEO TITLE: Biscoff Cheesecake Bowl    Macros:  305 Calories | 33g Carbs | 7.5g Fat | 25g Protein    Ingredients:  170g Plain Nonfat Greek Yogurt  7g Cheesecake Pudding Mix  2Tbsp Zero Sugar Cool Whip  3 Biscoff Cookies  2Tbsp PB2    Instructions:  Mix Yogurt, Pudding Mix, & Cool Whip In A Bowl.  Crush 3 Biscoff Cookies on top.  Mix PB2 With 1 Tbsp Water To Make Drizzle & Top It Off.  Serve & Enjoy! #cheesecake #biscoff #dessert #dessertideas #dessertrecipe #proteindessert #lowcalorie #highprotein #lowcarb #lowcarbrecipes #highproteinrecipes #healthyrecipes #easyrecipe #snack #snacks

VIDEO CONTENT: You can eat biscoff cheesecake and lose weight. This has become one of my most popular and most liked desserts and millions of people can attest to it. So let me show you how to make it and I promise you we can still hit those fitness goals. Look y'all if you haven't made any of my desserts please make this one. The first thing we need is a mixing bowl. Then we need our favorite thing in the world plain nonfat greek yogurt. And we're adding 170 grams of it to our mixing bowl. Next up we need some sugar free cheesecake pudding mix. And we need 7 grams of it. This is what's going to give us that cheesecake flavor so we're going to add it right into our bowl. And now it's time to give it a good mix. Now look when I say mix this I mean really mix it. It shouldn't even be all the way white anymore it should have a tan tint to it. This is only going to taste like cheesecake but this is how you make sure you get that. If you've ever had a yogurt recipe that still tastes like yogurt it's because you didn't mix it well enough. So get that really mixed in. I mean like you going for at least 2 minutes. The next thing we need is some sugar free cool whip. Zero sugar, sugar free, either way. And we're dropping 2 tablespoons of it into our bowl. And get that mixed in there too. You're definitely getting the arm workout with this one. The cool whip is going to give it a lighter fluffier and more overall enjoyable texture. The cool whip is very important. Do not make this without that. Now you can either leave this in a bowl and eat it just like this if you want to or you can be extra like me and put it in a presentation dish. But look y'all know me and I'm going to be extra every time. The next thing we need is the star of the show which if you know you know, biscoff is some of the best cookies in the world. Now go ahead and get you 3 of them and I know 3 does not sound like enough at all but I promise you it's going to go a long way just trust me. Now we're going to go ahead and crush them up and that's going to give us that biscoff graham cracker crust effect. Then take your cheesecake bowl and sprinkle it right over the top. We got to add more toppings because nobody likes dessert without toppings. So we're going to make a peanut butter drizzle. And at the same time we're going to keep the calories lower and the protein higher so we're going to make the drizzle out of PB2. It's real simple just take 2 tablespoons of PB2 and we're going to mix it with 1 tablespoon of water. Now you can adjust how much water you add to it based on how thick you want it but you should have a drizzle that comes out looking like this. Now go ahead and drizzle it right over the top of your bowl. This recipe and many more in my new cookbook Exquisite Cuisine and it's available now. I got 75 recipes in here that I know that you will love and enjoy and anything that you need for your health journey I promise you I got it in here. So keep a look out for the cookbook and let me know if you want one. But I appreciate the love and I'll catch you in the next video.

Cheesecake Base: Add 7g of cheesecake pudding mix and mix well until combined, achieving a tan tint.
Cheesecake Base: Fold in 2 tablespoons of zero sugar Cool Whip until fully integrated.

recipes.rawText:
VIDEO TITLE: Crockpot Marry Me Chicken Sandwiches are an easy dinner recipe!  INGREDIENTS 1 lb chicken breast  1/2 tsp each salt, pepper, oregano, thyme 1 tsp each onion powder and garlic powder 1/4 tsp red pepper flakes 1 tbsp minced garlic 1/3 cup sun dried tomatoes, chopped  1/2 cup of chicken broth  8 slices of bacon  1 block of cream cheese 1 cup of shredded mozzarella cheese Brioche buns  INSTRUCTIONS  Spray a crockpot with cooking spray and add the chicken. Season the chicken with salt, pepper, oregano, thyme, onion powder, garlic powder, and red pepper flakes. Next, add the minced garlic, chopped sun dried tomatoes, and chicken broth.  Be sure to stir the sun dried tomatoes and garlic around. You want the sun dried tomatoes to be down in the chicken broth, so they don‚Äôt burn.  Cook on low for 4-6 hours. Once the chicken is fully cooked shred the chicken, add a block of cream cheese, and shredded mozzarella cheese. Let this keep cooking on low until the cream cheese is melted and stir everything together well.  Cook bacon while cream cheese is melting. Once bacon is cooked build sandwiches on toasted buns and top with the crispy bacon. Enjoy!  #easyrecipes #crockpotrecipe #marrymechicken #sandwiches 

VIDEO CONTENT: On tonight's menu we've got these super easy Crock-Pot Marry Me Chicken Sandwiches. My family loved this one and it's one that you can just dump in the Crock-Pot and go on about your day knowing that dinner is ready to go. To make it you're just going to grab your Crock-Pot and throw in one pound of chicken breast, the seasonings I've listed below, some busy people garlic, sun-dried tomatoes, and half a cup of chicken broth. That's going to cook on low for four to six hours and once it comes to a temp that's not going to have you calling it Marry Me Chicken you can just bust out the Binford 5000 and get it shredded up. Then we're just going to throw in a block of cream cheese and a handful of mozzarella, throw that lid back on to get it melted and it's time to eat.

steps: Crockpot Marry Me Chicken: Spray the crockpot with cooking spray.
Crockpot Marry Me Chicken: Add the chicken breast to the crockpot.
Crockpot Marry Me Chicken: Season the chicken with salt, pepper, oregano, thyme, onion powder, garlic powder, and red pepper flakes.
Crockpot Marry Me Chicken: Add the minced garlic, chopped sun dried tomatoes, and chicken broth. Stir well to ensure the sun dried tomatoes are submerged in the broth.
Crockpot Marry Me Chicken: Cook on low for 4-6 hours until the chicken is fully cooked.
Crockpot Marry Me Chicken: Once cooked, shred the chicken in the crockpot.
Crockpot Marry Me Chicken: Add the block of cream cheese and shredded mozzarella cheese to the crockpot. Stir until melted and combined.
Bacon: Cook the bacon in a skillet until crispy.
Sandwich Assembly: Toast the brioche buns.
Sandwich Assembly: Build the sandwiches by placing the shredded chicken mixture on the bottom half of the toasted buns.
Sandwich Assembly: Top with crispy bacon and cover with the top half of the buns.
